3068  r(-p:p, -p:p) => work(l+1:m)
3069  l = m + n
3070  scal_uvw_m(-p:p) => work(m+1:l)
3071  m = l + n
3072  scal_u_n(-p:p) => work(l+1:m)
3073  l = m + n
3074  scal_v_n(-p:p) => work(m+1:l)
3075  m = l + n
3076  scal_w_n(-p:p) => work(l+1:m)
3077  ! l = 2
3078  r(2, 2) = (r1(1, 1)*r1(1, 1) - r1(1, -1)*r1(1, -1) - &
3079  & r1(-1, 1)*r1(-1, 1) + r1(-1, -1)*r1(-1, -1)) / two
3080  r(2, 1) = r1(1, 1)*r1(1, 0) - r1(-1, 1)*r1(-1, 0)
3081  r(2, 0) = sqrt3 / two * (r1(1, 0)*r1(1, 0) - r1(-1, 0)*r1(-1, 0))
3082  r(2, -1) = r1(1, -1)*r1(1, 0) - r1(-1, -1)*r1(-1, 0)
3083  r(2, -2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(1, -1) - r1(-1, 1)*r1(-1, -1)
3084  r(1, 2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(0, 1) - r1(1, -1)*r1(0, -1)
3085  r(1, 1) = r1(1, 1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(0, 1)
3086  r(1, 0) = sqrt3 * r1(1, 0) * r1(0, 0)
3087  r(1, -1) = r1(1, -1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(0, -1)
3088  r(1, -2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(0, -1) + r1(1, -1)*r1(0, 1)
3089  r(0, 2) = sqrt3 / two * (r1(0, 1)*r1(0, 1) - r1(0, -1)*r1(0, -1))
3090  r(0, 1) = sqrt3 * r1(0, 1) * r1(0, 0)
3091  r(0, 0) = (three*r1(0, 0)*r1(0, 0)-one) / two
3092  r(0, -1) = sqrt3 * r1(0, -1) * r1(0, 0)
3093  r(0, -2) = sqrt3 * r1(0, 1) * r1(0, -1)
3094  r(-1, 2) = r1(-1, 1)*r1(0, 1) - r1(-1, -1)*r1(0, -1)
3095  r(-1, 1) = r1(-1, 1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(-1, 0)*r1(0, 1)
3096  r(-1, 0) = sqrt3 * r1(-1, 0) * r1(0, 0)
3097  r(-1, -1) = r1(-1, -1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(0, -1)*r1(-1, 0)
3098  r(-1, -2) = r1(-1, 1)*r1(0, -1) + r1(-1, -1)*r1(0, 1)
3099  r(-2, 2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(-1, 1) - r1(1, -1)*r1(-1, -1)
3100  r(-2, 1) = r1(1, 1)*r1(-1, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(-1, 1)
3101  r(-2, 0) = sqrt3 * r1(1, 0) * r1(-1, 0)
3102  r(-2, -1) = r1(1, -1)*r1(-1, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(-1, -1)
3103  r(-2, -2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(-1, -1) + r1(1, -1)*r1(-1, 1)
3104  do m = -2, 2
3105  dst(7+m) = alpha * dot_product(r(-2:2, m), src(5:9))
3106  end do
3107  ! l > 2
3108  do l = 3, p
3109  ! Swap previous and current rotation matrices
3110  r_swap => r_prev
3111  r_prev => r
3112  r => r_swap
3113  ! Prepare scalar factors
3114  scal_uvw_m(0) = dble(l)
3115  do m = 1, l-1
3116  u = sqrt(dble(l*l-m*m))
3117  scal_uvw_m(m) = u
3118  scal_uvw_m(-m) = u
3119  end do
3120  u = two * dble(l)
3121  u = sqrt(dble(u*(u-one)))
3122  scal_uvw_m(l) = u
3123  scal_uvw_m(-l) = u
3124  scal_u_n(0) = dble(l)
3125  scal_v_n(0) = -sqrt(dble(l*(l-1))) / sqrt2
3126  scal_w_n(0) = zero
3127  do n = 1, l-2
3128  u = sqrt(dble(l*l-n*n))
3129  scal_u_n(n) = u
3130  scal_u_n(-n) = u
3131  v = dble(l+n)
3132  v = sqrt(v*(v-one)) / two
3133  scal_v_n(n) = v
3134  scal_v_n(-n) = v
3135  w = dble(l-n)
3136  w = -sqrt(w*(w-one)) / two
3137  scal_w_n(n) = w
3138  scal_w_n(-n) = w
3139  end do
3140  u = sqrt(dble(2*l-1))
3141  scal_u_n(l-1) = u
3142  scal_u_n(1-l) = u
3143  scal_u_n(l) = zero
3144  scal_u_n(-l) = zero
3145  v = sqrt(dble((2*l-1)*(2*l-2))) / two
3146  scal_v_n(l-1) = v
3147  scal_v_n(1-l) = v
3148  v = sqrt(dble(2*l*(2*l-1))) / two
3149  scal_v_n(l) = v
3150  scal_v_n(-l) = v
3151  scal_w_n(l-1) = zero
3152  scal_w_n(l) = zero
3153  scal_w_n(-l) = zero
3154  scal_w_n(1-l) = zero
3155  ind = l*l + l + 1
3156  ! m = l, n = l
3157  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) - &
3158  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l)
3159  r(l, l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3160  !dst(ind+l) = src(ind+l) * r(l, l)
3161  ! m = l, n = -l
3162  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) + &
3163  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l)
3164  r(-l, l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3165  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind-l)*r(-l, l)
3166  ! m = l, n = l-1
3167  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l)
3168  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l) - &
3169  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l)
3170  r(l-1, l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3171  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+l-1)*r(l-1, l)
3172  ! m = l, n = 1-l
3173  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l)
3174  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l) + &
3175  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l)
3176  r(1-l, l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3177  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+1-l)*r(1-l, l)
3178  ! m = l, n = 1
3179  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1, 1-l)
3180  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(0, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(0, 1-l)
3181  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2, 1-l) + &
3182  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-2, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l)
3183  r(1, l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3184  r(1, l) = r(1, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3185  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+1)*r(1, l)
3186  ! m = l, n = -1
3187  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-1, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l)
3188  v = r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(0, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(0, 1-l)
3189  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-2, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l) - &
3190  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2, 1-l)
3191  r(-1, l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3192  r(-1, l) = r(-1, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3193  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind-1)*r(-1, l)
3194  ! m = l, n = 0
3195  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(0, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(0, 1-l)
3196  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1, 1-l) + &
3197  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l)
3198  r(0, l) = (u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3199  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind)*r(0, l)
3200  ! m = l, n = 2-l..l-2, n != -1,0,1
3201  do n = 2, l-2
3202  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(n, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(n, 1-l)
3203  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l) - &
3204  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l)
3205  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l) + &
3206  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l)
3207  r(n, l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3208  r(n, l) = r(n, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3209  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+n)*r(n, l)
3210  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-n, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-n, 1-l)
3211  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l) + &
3212  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l)
3213  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l) - &
3214  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l)
3215  r(-n, l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3216  r(-n, l) = r(-n, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3217  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind-n)*r(-n, l)
3218  end do
3219  dst(ind+l) = alpha * dot_product(src(ind-l:ind+l), r(-l:l, l))
3220  ! m = -l, n = l
3221  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - &
3222  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1)
3223  r(l, -l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3224  !dst(ind-l) = src(ind+l)*r(l, -l)
3225  ! m = -l, n = -l
3226  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) + &
3227  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1)
3228  r(-l, -l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3229  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind-l)*r(-l, -l)
3230  ! m = -l, n = l-1
3231  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1)
3232  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1) - &
3233  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1)
3234  r(l-1, -l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3235  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+l-1)*r(l-1, -l)
3236  ! m = -l, n = 1-l
3237  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1)
3238  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1) + &
3239  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1)
3240  r(1-l, -l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3241  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+1-l)*r(1-l, -l)
3242  ! m = -l, n = 1
3243  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1, l-1)
3244  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(0, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(0, l-1)
3245  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2, l-1) + &
3246  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-2, l-1)
3247  r(1, -l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3248  r(1, -l) = r(1, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3249  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+1)*r(1, -l)
3250  ! m = -l, n = -1
3251  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-1, l-1)
3252  v = r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(0, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(0, l-1)
3253  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-2, l-1) - &
3254  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2, l-1)
3255  r(-1, -l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3256  r(-1, -l) = r(-1, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3257  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind-1)*r(-1, -l)
3258  ! m = -l, n = 0
3259  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(0, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(0, l-1)
3260  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1, l-1) + &
3261  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-1, l-1)
3262  r(0, -l) = (u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3263  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind)*r(0, -l)
3264  ! m = -l, n = 2-l..l-2, n != -1,0,1
3265  do n = 2, l-2
3266  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(n, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(n, l-1)
3267  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1) - &
3268  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1)
3269  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1) + &
3270  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1)
3271  r(n, -l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3272  r(n, -l) = r(n, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3273  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+n)*r(n, -l)
3274  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-n, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-n, l-1)
3275  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1) + &
3276  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1)
3277  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1) - &
3278  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1)
3279  r(-n, -l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3280  r(-n, -l) = r(-n, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3281  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind-n)*r(-n, -l)
3282  end do
3283  dst(ind-l) = alpha * dot_product(src(ind-l:ind+l), r(-l:l, -l))
3284  ! Now deal with m=1-l..l-1
3285  do m = 1-l, l-1
3286  ! n = l
3287  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(l-1, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(1-l, m)
3288  r(l, m) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3289  !dst(ind+m) = src(ind+l) * r(l, m)
3290  ! n = -l
3291  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(1-l, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(l-1, m)
3292  r(-l, m) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3293  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind-l)*r(-l, m)
3294  ! n = l-1
3295  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(l-1, m)
3296  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(l-2, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(2-l, m)
3297  r(l-1, m) = u*scal_u_n(l-1) + v*scal_v_n(l-1)
3298  r(l-1, m) = r(l-1, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3299  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+l-1)*r(l-1, m)
3300  ! n = 1-l
3301  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(1-l, m)
3302  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(2-l, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(l-2, m)
3303  r(1-l, m) = u*scal_u_n(l-1) + v*scal_v_n(l-1)
3304  r(1-l, m) = r(1-l, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3305  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+1-l)*r(1-l, m)
3306  ! n = 0
3307  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(0, m)
3308  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(1, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(-1, m)
3309  r(0, m) = u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)
3310  r(0, m) = r(0, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3311  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind)*r(0, m)
3312  ! n = 1
3313  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(1, m)
3314  v = r1(1, 0) * r_prev(0, m)
3315  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(2, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(-2, m)
3316  r(1, m) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3317  r(1, m) = r(1, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3318  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+1)*r(1, m)
3319  ! n = -1
3320  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(-1, m)
3321  v = r1(-1, 0) * r_prev(0, m)
3322  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(-2, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(2, m)
3323  r(-1, m) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3324  r(-1, m) = r(-1, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3325  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind-1)*r(-1, m)
3326  ! n = 2-l..l-2, n != -1,0,1
3327  do n = 2, l-2
3328  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(n, m)
3329  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(n-1, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(1-n, m)
3330  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(n+1, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(-1-n, m)
3331  r(n, m) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3332  r(n, m) = r(n, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3333  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+n)*r(n, m)
3334  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(-n, m)
3335  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(1-n, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(n-1, m)
3336  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(-n-1, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(n+1, m)
3337  r(-n, m) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3338  r(-n, m) = r(-n, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3339  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind-n)*r(-n, m)
3340  end do
3341  dst(ind+m) = alpha * dot_product(src(ind-l:ind+l), r(-l:l, m))
3342  end do
3343  end do
3344  else
3345  ! Compute rotations/reflections
3346  ! l = 0
3347  dst(1) = beta*dst(1) + alpha*src(1)
3348  if (p .eq. 0) then
3349  return
3350  end if
3351  ! l = 1
3352  dst(2) = beta*dst(2) + alpha*dot_product(r1(-1:1,-1), src(2:4))
3353  dst(3) = beta*dst(3) + alpha*dot_product(r1(-1:1,0), src(2:4))
3354  dst(4) = beta*dst(4) + alpha*dot_product(r1(-1:1,1), src(2:4))
3355  if (p .eq. 1) then
3356  return
3357  end if
3358  ! Set pointers
3359  n = 2*p + 1
3360  l = n ** 2
3361  r_prev(-p:p, -p:p) => work(1:l)
3362  m = 2*l
3363  r(-p:p, -p:p) => work(l+1:m)
3364  l = m + n
3365  scal_uvw_m(-p:p) => work(m+1:l)
3366  m = l + n
3367  scal_u_n(-p:p) => work(l+1:m)
3368  l = m + n
3369  scal_v_n(-p:p) => work(m+1:l)
3370  m = l + n
3371  scal_w_n(-p:p) => work(l+1:m)
3372  ! l = 2
3373  r(2, 2) = (r1(1, 1)*r1(1, 1) - r1(1, -1)*r1(1, -1) - &
3374  & r1(-1, 1)*r1(-1, 1) + r1(-1, -1)*r1(-1, -1)) / two
3375  r(2, 1) = r1(1, 1)*r1(1, 0) - r1(-1, 1)*r1(-1, 0)
3376  r(2, 0) = sqrt3 / two * (r1(1, 0)*r1(1, 0) - r1(-1, 0)*r1(-1, 0))
3377  r(2, -1) = r1(1, -1)*r1(1, 0) - r1(-1, -1)*r1(-1, 0)
3378  r(2, -2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(1, -1) - r1(-1, 1)*r1(-1, -1)
3379  r(1, 2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(0, 1) - r1(1, -1)*r1(0, -1)
3380  r(1, 1) = r1(1, 1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(0, 1)
3381  r(1, 0) = sqrt3 * r1(1, 0) * r1(0, 0)
3382  r(1, -1) = r1(1, -1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(0, -1)
3383  r(1, -2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(0, -1) + r1(1, -1)*r1(0, 1)
3384  r(0, 2) = sqrt3 / two * (r1(0, 1)*r1(0, 1) - r1(0, -1)*r1(0, -1))
3385  r(0, 1) = sqrt3 * r1(0, 1) * r1(0, 0)
3386  r(0, 0) = (three*r1(0, 0)*r1(0, 0)-one) / two
3387  r(0, -1) = sqrt3 * r1(0, -1) * r1(0, 0)
3388  r(0, -2) = sqrt3 * r1(0, 1) * r1(0, -1)
3389  r(-1, 2) = r1(-1, 1)*r1(0, 1) - r1(-1, -1)*r1(0, -1)
3390  r(-1, 1) = r1(-1, 1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(-1, 0)*r1(0, 1)
3391  r(-1, 0) = sqrt3 * r1(-1, 0) * r1(0, 0)
3392  r(-1, -1) = r1(-1, -1)*r1(0, 0) + r1(0, -1)*r1(-1, 0)
3393  r(-1, -2) = r1(-1, 1)*r1(0, -1) + r1(-1, -1)*r1(0, 1)
3394  r(-2, 2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(-1, 1) - r1(1, -1)*r1(-1, -1)
3395  r(-2, 1) = r1(1, 1)*r1(-1, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(-1, 1)
3396  r(-2, 0) = sqrt3 * r1(1, 0) * r1(-1, 0)
3397  r(-2, -1) = r1(1, -1)*r1(-1, 0) + r1(1, 0)*r1(-1, -1)
3398  r(-2, -2) = r1(1, 1)*r1(-1, -1) + r1(1, -1)*r1(-1, 1)
3399  do m = -2, 2
3400  dst(7+m) = beta*dst(7+m) + alpha*dot_product(r(-2:2, m), src(5:9))
3401  end do
3402  ! l > 2
3403  do l = 3, p
3404  ! Swap previous and current rotation matrices
3405  r_swap => r_prev
3406  r_prev => r
3407  r => r_swap
3408  ! Prepare scalar factors
3409  scal_uvw_m(0) = dble(l)
3410  do m = 1, l-1
3411  u = sqrt(dble(l*l-m*m))
3412  scal_uvw_m(m) = u
3413  scal_uvw_m(-m) = u
3414  end do
3415  u = two * dble(l)
3416  u = sqrt(dble(u*(u-one)))
3417  scal_uvw_m(l) = u
3418  scal_uvw_m(-l) = u
3419  scal_u_n(0) = dble(l)
3420  scal_v_n(0) = -sqrt(dble(l*(l-1))) / sqrt2
3421  scal_w_n(0) = zero
3422  do n = 1, l-2
3423  u = sqrt(dble(l*l-n*n))
3424  scal_u_n(n) = u
3425  scal_u_n(-n) = u
3426  v = dble(l+n)
3427  v = sqrt(v*(v-one)) / two
3428  scal_v_n(n) = v
3429  scal_v_n(-n) = v
3430  w = dble(l-n)
3431  w = -sqrt(w*(w-one)) / two
3432  scal_w_n(n) = w
3433  scal_w_n(-n) = w
3434  end do
3435  u = sqrt(dble(2*l-1))
3436  scal_u_n(l-1) = u
3437  scal_u_n(1-l) = u
3438  scal_u_n(l) = zero
3439  scal_u_n(-l) = zero
3440  v = sqrt(dble((2*l-1)*(2*l-2))) / two
3441  scal_v_n(l-1) = v
3442  scal_v_n(1-l) = v
3443  v = sqrt(dble(2*l*(2*l-1))) / two
3444  scal_v_n(l) = v
3445  scal_v_n(-l) = v
3446  scal_w_n(l-1) = zero
3447  scal_w_n(l) = zero
3448  scal_w_n(-l) = zero
3449  scal_w_n(1-l) = zero
3450  ind = l*l + l + 1
3451  ! m = l, n = l
3452  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) - &
3453  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l)
3454  r(l, l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3455  !dst(ind+l) = src(ind+l) * r(l, l)
3456  ! m = l, n = -l
3457  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) + &
3458  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l)
3459  r(-l, l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3460  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind-l)*r(-l, l)
3461  ! m = l, n = l-1
3462  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l)
3463  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l) - &
3464  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l)
3465  r(l-1, l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3466  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+l-1)*r(l-1, l)
3467  ! m = l, n = 1-l
3468  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l)
3469  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l) + &
3470  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l)
3471  r(1-l, l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3472  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+1-l)*r(1-l, l)
3473  ! m = l, n = 1
3474  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1, 1-l)
3475  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(0, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(0, 1-l)
3476  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2, 1-l) + &
3477  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-2, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l)
3478  r(1, l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3479  r(1, l) = r(1, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3480  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+1)*r(1, l)
3481  ! m = l, n = -1
3482  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-1, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l)
3483  v = r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(0, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(0, 1-l)
3484  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-2, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l) - &
3485  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2, 1-l)
3486  r(-1, l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3487  r(-1, l) = r(-1, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3488  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind-1)*r(-1, l)
3489  ! m = l, n = 0
3490  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(0, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(0, 1-l)
3491  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1, 1-l) + &
3492  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l)
3493  r(0, l) = (u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3494  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind)*r(0, l)
3495  ! m = l, n = 2-l..l-2, n != -1,0,1
3496  do n = 2, l-2
3497  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(n, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(n, 1-l)
3498  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l) - &
3499  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l)
3500  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l) + &
3501  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l)
3502  r(n, l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3503  r(n, l) = r(n, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3504  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind+n)*r(n, l)
3505  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-n, l-1) - r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-n, 1-l)
3506  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l) + &
3507  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l)
3508  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1) - r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l) - &
3509  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l)
3510  r(-n, l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3511  r(-n, l) = r(-n, l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3512  !dst(ind+l) = dst(ind+l) + src(ind-n)*r(-n, l)
3513  end do
3514  dst(ind+l) = beta*dst(ind+l) + &
3515  & alpha*dot_product(src(ind-l:ind+l), r(-l:l, l))
3516  ! m = -l, n = l
3517  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1) - &
3518  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1)
3519  r(l, -l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3520  !dst(ind-l) = src(ind+l)*r(l, -l)
3521  ! m = -l, n = -l
3522  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1) + &
3523  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1)
3524  r(-l, -l) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3525  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind-l)*r(-l, -l)
3526  ! m = -l, n = l-1
3527  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(l-1, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(l-1, l-1)
3528  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1) - &
3529  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1)
3530  r(l-1, -l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3531  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+l-1)*r(l-1, -l)
3532  ! m = -l, n = 1-l
3533  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1-l, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1-l, l-1)
3534  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2-l, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2-l, l-1) + &
3535  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(l-2, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(l-2, l-1)
3536  r(1-l, -l) = (u*scal_u_n(l-1)+v*scal_v_n(l-1)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3537  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+1-l)*r(1-l, -l)
3538  ! m = -l, n = 1
3539  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(1, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(1, l-1)
3540  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(0, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(0, l-1)
3541  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(2, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(2, l-1) + &
3542  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-2, l-1)
3543  r(1, -l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3544  r(1, -l) = r(1, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3545  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+1)*r(1, -l)
3546  ! m = -l, n = -1
3547  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-1, l-1)
3548  v = r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(0, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(0, l-1)
3549  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-2, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-2, l-1) - &
3550  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(2, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(2, l-1)
3551  r(-1, -l) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3552  r(-1, -l) = r(-1, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3553  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind-1)*r(-1, -l)
3554  ! m = -l, n = 0
3555  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(0, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(0, l-1)
3556  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1, l-1) + &
3557  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-1, l-1)
3558  r(0, -l) = (u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3559  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind)*r(0, -l)
3560  ! m = -l, n = 2-l..l-2, n != -1,0,1
3561  do n = 2, l-2
3562  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(n, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(n, l-1)
3563  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1) - &
3564  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1)
3565  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1) + &
3566  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1)
3567  r(n, -l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3568  r(n, -l) = r(n, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3569  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind+n)*r(n, -l)
3570  u = r1(0, 1)*r_prev(-n, 1-l) + r1(0, -1)*r_prev(-n, l-1)
3571  v = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(1-n, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(1-n, l-1) + &
3572  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n-1, 1-l) + r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n-1, l-1)
3573  w = r1(1, 1)*r_prev(-n-1, 1-l) + r1(1, -1)*r_prev(-n-1, l-1) - &
3574  & r1(-1, 1)*r_prev(n+1, 1-l) - r1(-1, -1)*r_prev(n+1, l-1)
3575  r(-n, -l) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3576  r(-n, -l) = r(-n, -l) / scal_uvw_m(l)
3577  !dst(ind-l) = dst(ind-l) + src(ind-n)*r(-n, -l)
3578  end do
3579  dst(ind-l) = beta*dst(ind-l) + &
3580  & alpha*dot_product(src(ind-l:ind+l), r(-l:l, -l))
3581  ! Now deal with m=1-l..l-1
3582  do m = 1-l, l-1
3583  ! n = l
3584  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(l-1, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(1-l, m)
3585  r(l, m) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3586  !dst(ind+m) = src(ind+l) * r(l, m)
3587  ! n = -l
3588  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(1-l, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(l-1, m)
3589  r(-l, m) = v * scal_v_n(l) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3590  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind-l)*r(-l, m)
3591  ! n = l-1
3592  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(l-1, m)
3593  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(l-2, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(2-l, m)
3594  r(l-1, m) = u*scal_u_n(l-1) + v*scal_v_n(l-1)
3595  r(l-1, m) = r(l-1, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3596  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+l-1)*r(l-1, m)
3597  ! n = 1-l
3598  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(1-l, m)
3599  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(2-l, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(l-2, m)
3600  r(1-l, m) = u*scal_u_n(l-1) + v*scal_v_n(l-1)
3601  r(1-l, m) = r(1-l, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3602  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+1-l)*r(1-l, m)
3603  ! n = 0
3604  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(0, m)
3605  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(1, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(-1, m)
3606  r(0, m) = u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)
3607  r(0, m) = r(0, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3608  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind)*r(0, m)
3609  ! n = 1
3610  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(1, m)
3611  v = r1(1, 0) * r_prev(0, m)
3612  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(2, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(-2, m)
3613  r(1, m) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3614  r(1, m) = r(1, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3615  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+1)*r(1, m)
3616  ! n = -1
3617  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(-1, m)
3618  v = r1(-1, 0) * r_prev(0, m)
3619  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(-2, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(2, m)
3620  r(-1, m) = u*scal_u_n(1) + sqrt2*v*scal_v_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
3621  r(-1, m) = r(-1, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3622  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind-1)*r(-1, m)
3623  ! n = 2-l..l-2, n != -1,0,1
3624  do n = 2, l-2
3625  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(n, m)
3626  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(n-1, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(1-n, m)
3627  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(n+1, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(-1-n, m)
3628  r(n, m) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3629  r(n, m) = r(n, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3630  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind+n)*r(n, m)
3631  u = r1(0, 0) * r_prev(-n, m)
3632  v = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(1-n, m) + r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(n-1, m)
3633  w = r1(1, 0)*r_prev(-n-1, m) - r1(-1, 0)*r_prev(n+1, m)
3634  r(-n, m) = u*scal_u_n(n) + v*scal_v_n(n) + w*scal_w_n(n)
3635  r(-n, m) = r(-n, m) / scal_uvw_m(m)
3636  !dst(ind+m) = dst(ind+m) + src(ind-n)*r(-n, m)
3637  end do
3638  dst(ind+m) = beta*dst(ind+m) + &
3639  & alpha*dot_product(src(ind-l:ind+l), r(-l:l, m))
3640  end do
3641  end do
3642  end if
3643 end subroutine fmm_sph_transform_work
3644 
3666 subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src, beta, dst)
3667  ! Inputs
3668  integer, intent(in) :: p
3669  real(dp), intent(in) :: vcos(p+1), vsin(p+1), alpha, src((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
3670  ! Output
3671  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst((p+1)*(p+1))
3672  ! Call corresponding work routine
3673  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src, beta, dst)
3674 end subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz
3675 
3697 subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src, beta, dst)
3698  ! Inputs
3699  integer, intent(in) :: p
3700  real(dp), intent(in) :: vcos(p+1), vsin(p+1), alpha, src((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
3701  ! Output
3702  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst((p+1)*(p+1))
3703  ! Local variables
3704  integer :: l, m, ind
3705  real(dp) :: v1, v2, v3, v4
3706  ! In case alpha is zero just scale output
3707  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
3708  ! Set output to zero if beta is also zero
3709  if (beta .eq. zero) then
3710  dst = zero
3711  else
3712  dst = beta * dst
3713  end if
3714  ! Exit subroutine
3715  return
3716  end if
3717  ! Now alpha is non-zero
3718  ! In case beta is zero output is just overwritten without being read
3719  if (beta .eq. zero) then
3720  ! l = 0
3721  dst(1) = alpha*src(1)
3722  ! l > 0
3723  !!GCC$ unroll 4
3724  do l = 1, p
3725  ind = l*l + l + 1
3726  ! m = 0
3727  dst(ind) = alpha*src(ind)
3728  ! m != 0
3729  !!GCC$ unroll 4
3730  do m = 1, l
3731  v1 = src(ind+m)
3732  v2 = src(ind-m)
3733  v3 = vcos(1+m)
3734  v4 = vsin(1+m)
3735  ! m > 0
3736  dst(ind+m) = alpha * (v1*v3-v2*v4)
3737  ! m < 0
3738  dst(ind-m) = alpha * (v1*v4+v2*v3)
3739  end do
3740  end do
3741  else
3742  ! l = 0
3743  dst(1) = beta*dst(1) + alpha*src(1)
3744  ! l > 0
3745  !!GCC$ unroll 4
3746  do l = 1, p
3747  ind = l*l + l + 1
3748  ! m = 0
3749  dst(ind) = beta*dst(ind) + alpha*src(ind)
3750  ! m != 0
3751  !!GCC$ unroll 4
3752  do m = 1, l
3753  v1 = src(ind+m)
3754  v2 = src(ind-m)
3755  v3 = vcos(1+m)
3756  v4 = vsin(1+m)
3757  ! m > 0
3758  dst(ind+m) = beta*dst(ind+m) + alpha*(v1*v3-v2*v4)
3759  ! m < 0
3760  dst(ind-m) = beta*dst(ind-m) + alpha*(v1*v4+v2*v3)
3761  end do
3762  end do
3763  end if
3764 end subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work
3765 
3787 subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src, beta, dst)
3788  ! Inputs
3789  integer, intent(in) :: p
3790  real(dp), intent(in) :: vcos(p+1), vsin(p+1), alpha, src((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
3791  ! Output
3792  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst((p+1)*(p+1))
3793  ! Call corresponding work routine
3794  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src, beta, dst)
3795 end subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj
3796 
3818 subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src, beta, dst)
3819  ! Inputs
3820  integer, intent(in) :: p
3821  real(dp), intent(in) :: vcos(p+1), vsin(p+1), alpha, src((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
3822  ! Output
3823  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst((p+1)*(p+1))
3824  ! Local variables
3825  integer :: l, m, ind
3826  real(dp) :: v1, v2, v3, v4
3827  ! In case alpha is zero just scale output
3828  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
3829  ! Set output to zero if beta is also zero
3830  if (beta .eq. zero) then
3831  dst = zero
3832  else
3833  dst = beta * dst
3834  end if
3835  ! Exit subroutine
3836  return
3837  end if
3838  ! Now alpha is non-zero
3839  ! In case beta is zero output is just overwritten without being read
3840  if (beta .eq. zero) then
3841  ! l = 0
3842  dst(1) = alpha*src(1)
3843  ! l > 0
3844  do l = 1, p
3845  ind = l*l + l + 1
3846  ! m = 0
3847  dst(ind) = alpha*src(ind)
3848  ! m != 0
3849  do m = 1, l
3850  v1 = src(ind+m)
3851  v2 = src(ind-m)
3852  v3 = vcos(1+m)
3853  v4 = vsin(1+m)
3854  ! m > 0
3855  dst(ind+m) = alpha * (v1*v3+v2*v4)
3856  ! m < 0
3857  dst(ind-m) = alpha * (v2*v3-v1*v4)
3858  end do
3859  end do
3860  else
3861  ! l = 0
3862  dst(1) = beta*dst(1) + alpha*src(1)
3863  ! l > 0
3864  do l = 1, p
3865  ind = l*l + l + 1
3866  ! m = 0
3867  dst(ind) = beta*dst(ind) + alpha*src(ind)
3868  ! m != 0
3869  do m = 1, l
3870  v1 = src(ind+m)
3871  v2 = src(ind-m)
3872  v3 = vcos(1+m)
3873  v4 = vsin(1+m)
3874  ! m > 0
3875  dst(ind+m) = beta*dst(ind+m) + alpha*(v1*v3+v2*v4)
3876  ! m < 0
3877  dst(ind-m) = beta*dst(ind-m) + alpha*(v2*v3-v1*v4)
3878  end do
3879  end do
3880  end if
3881 end subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work
3882 
3915 subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oxz(p, ctheta, stheta, alpha, src, beta, dst)
3916  ! Inputs
3917  integer, intent(in) :: p
3918  real(dp), intent(in) :: ctheta, stheta, alpha, src((p+1)**2), beta
3919  ! Output
3920  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst((p+1)**2)
3921  ! Temporary workspace
3922  real(dp) :: work(2*(2*p+1)*(2*p+3)+p)
3923  ! Call corresponding work routine
3924  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, alpha, src, beta, dst, &
3925  & work)
3926 end subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oxz
3927 
3940 subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, alpha, src, beta, dst, &
3941  & work)
3942  ! Inputs
3943  integer, intent(in) :: p
3944  real(dp), intent(in) :: ctheta, stheta, alpha, src((p+1)**2), beta
3945  ! Output
3946  real(dp), intent(out) :: dst((p+1)*(p+1))
3947  ! Temporary workspace
3948  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(4*p*p+13*p+4)
3949  ! Local variables
3950  real(dp) :: u, v, w, fl, fl2, tmp1, tmp2, vu(2), vv(2), vw(2), &
3951  ctheta2, stheta2, cstheta
3952  integer :: l, m, n, ind, k
3953  ! Pointers for a workspace
3954  real(dp), pointer :: r(:, :, :), r_prev(:, :, :), scal_uvw_m(:), &
3955  & scal_u_n(:), scal_v_n(:), scal_w_n(:), r_swap(:, :, :), vsqr(:)
3956  !! Spherical harmonics Y_l^m with negative m transform into harmonics Y_l^m
3957  !! with the same l and negative m, while harmonics Y_l^m with non-negative
3958  !! m transform into harmonics Y_l^m with the same l and non-negative m.
3959  !! Transformations for non-negative m will be stored in r(1, :, :) and for
3960  !! negative m will be in r(2, :, :)
3961  ! In case alpha is zero just scale output
3962  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
3963  ! Set output to zero if beta is also zero
3964  if (beta .eq. zero) then
3965  dst = zero
3966  else
3967  dst = beta * dst
3968  end if
3969  ! Exit subroutine
3970  return
3971  end if
3972  ! Now alpha is non-zero
3973  ! In case beta is zero output is just overwritten without being read
3974  if (beta .eq. zero) then
3975  ! Compute rotations/reflections
3976  ! l = 0
3977  dst(1) = alpha * src(1)
3978  if (p .eq. 0) then
3979  return
3980  end if
3981  ! l = 1
3982  dst(2) = alpha * src(2)
3983  dst(3) = alpha * (src(3)*ctheta - src(4)*stheta)
3984  dst(4) = alpha * (src(3)*stheta + src(4)*ctheta)
3985  if (p .eq. 1) then
3986  return
3987  end if
3988  ! Set pointers
3989  l = 2 * (p+1) * (p+1)
3990  r(1:2, 0:p, 0:p) => work(1:l)
3991  m = 2 * l
3992  r_prev(1:2, 0:p, 0:p) => work(l+1:m)
3993  l = m + p + 1
3994  scal_uvw_m(0:p) => work(m+1:l)
3995  m = l + p
3996  scal_u_n(0:p-1) => work(l+1:m)
3997  l = m + p + 1
3998  scal_v_n(0:p) => work(m+1:l)
3999  m = l + p - 2
4000  scal_w_n(1:p-2) => work(l+1:m)
4001  l = m + p
4002  vsqr(1:p) => work(m+1:l)
4003  ! l = 2, m >= 0
4004  ctheta2 = ctheta * ctheta
4005  cstheta = ctheta * stheta
4006  stheta2 = stheta * stheta
4007  r(1, 2, 2) = (ctheta2 + one) / two
4008  r(1, 1, 2) = cstheta
4009  r(1, 0, 2) = sqrt3 / two * stheta2
4010  dst(9) = alpha * (src(9)*r(1, 2, 2) + src(8)*r(1, 1, 2) + &
4011  & src(7)*r(1, 0, 2))
4012  r(1, 2, 1) = -cstheta
4013  r(1, 1, 1) = ctheta2 - stheta2
4014  r(1, 0, 1) = sqrt3 * cstheta
4015  dst(8) = alpha * (src(9)*r(1, 2, 1) + src(8)*r(1, 1, 1) + &
4016  & src(7)*r(1, 0, 1))
4017  r(1, 2, 0) = sqrt3 / two * stheta2
4018  r(1, 1, 0) = -sqrt3 * cstheta
4019  r(1, 0, 0) = (three*ctheta2-one) / two
4020  dst(7) = alpha * (src(9)*r(1, 2, 0) + src(8)*r(1, 1, 0) + &
4021  & src(7)*r(1, 0, 0))
4022  ! l = 2, m < 0
4023  r(2, 1, 1) = ctheta
4024  r(2, 2, 1) = -stheta
4025  dst(6) = alpha * (src(6)*r(2, 1, 1) + src(5)*r(2, 2, 1))
4026  r(2, 1, 2) = stheta
4027  r(2, 2, 2) = ctheta
4028  dst(5) = alpha * (src(6)*r(2, 1, 2) + src(5)*r(2, 2, 2))
4029  ! l > 2
4030  vsqr(1) = one
4031  vsqr(2) = four
4032  do l = 3, p
4033  ! Swap previous and current rotation matrices
4034  r_swap => r_prev
4035  r_prev => r
4036  r => r_swap
4037  ! Prepare scalar factors
4038  fl = dble(l)
4039  fl2 = fl * fl
4040  vsqr(l) = fl2
4041  scal_uvw_m(0) = one / fl
4042  !!GCC$ unroll 4
4043  do m = 1, l-1
4044  u = sqrt(fl2 - vsqr(m))
4045  scal_uvw_m(m) = one / u
4046  end do
4047  u = two * dble(l)
4048  u = sqrt(dble(u*(u-one)))
4049  scal_uvw_m(l) = one / u
4050  scal_u_n(0) = dble(l)
4051  scal_v_n(0) = -sqrt(dble(l*(l-1))) / sqrt2
4052  !!GCC$ unroll 4
4053  do n = 1, l-2
4054  u = sqrt(fl2-vsqr(n))
4055  scal_u_n(n) = u
4056  end do
4057  !!GCC$ unroll 4
4058  do n = 1, l-2
4059  v = dble(l+n)
4060  v = sqrt(v*v-v) / two
4061  scal_v_n(n) = v
4062  w = dble(l-n)
4063  w = -sqrt(w*w-w) / two
4064  scal_w_n(n) = w
4065  end do
4066  u = sqrt(dble(2*l-1))
4067  scal_u_n(l-1) = u
4068  v = sqrt(dble((2*l-1)*(2*l-2))) / two
4069  scal_v_n(l-1) = v
4070  v = sqrt(dble(2*l*(2*l-1))) / two
4071  scal_v_n(l) = v
4072  ind = l*l + l + 1
4073  ! m = l, n = l and m = -l, n = - l
4074  vv = ctheta*r_prev(:, l-1, l-1) + r_prev(2:1:-1, l-1, l-1)
4075  r(:, l, l) = vv * scal_v_n(l) * scal_uvw_m(l)
4076  tmp1 = src(ind+l) * r(1, l, l)
4077  tmp2 = src(ind-l) * r(2, l, l)
4078  ! m = l, n = l-1 and m = -l, n = 1-l
4079  vu = stheta * r_prev(:, l-1, l-1)
4080  vv = ctheta*r_prev(:, l-2, l-1) + r_prev(2:1:-1, l-2, l-1)
4081  r(:, l-1, l) = (vu*scal_u_n(l-1)+vv*scal_v_n(l-1)) * scal_uvw_m(l)
4082  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+l-1)*r(1, l-1, l)
4083  tmp2 = tmp2 + src(ind-l+1)*r(2, l-1, l)
4084  ! m = l, n = 1 and m = -l, n = -1
4085  vu = stheta * r_prev(:, 1, l-1)
4086  vv(1) = ctheta * r_prev(1, 0, l-1)
4087  vv(2) = r_prev(1, 0, l-1)
4088  vw = ctheta*r_prev(:, 2, l-1) - r_prev(2:1:-1, 2, l-1)
4089  r(:, 1, l) = vu*scal_u_n(1) + vw*scal_w_n(1) + sqrt2*scal_v_n(1)*vv
4090  r(:, 1, l) = r(:, 1, l) * scal_uvw_m(l)
4091  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+1)*r(1, 1, l)
4092  tmp2 = tmp2 + src(ind-1)*r(2, 1, l)
4093  ! m = l, n = 0
4094  u = stheta * r_prev(1, 0, l-1)
4095  v = ctheta*r_prev(1, 1, l-1) - r_prev(2, 1, l-1)
4096  r(1, 0, l) = (u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)) * scal_uvw_m(l)
4097  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind)*r(1, 0, l)
4098  ! m = l, n = 2..l-2 and m = -l, n = 2-l..-2
4099  !!GCC$ unroll 4
4100  do n = 2, l-2
4101  vu = stheta * r_prev(:, n, l-1)
4102  vv = ctheta*r_prev(:, n-1, l-1) + r_prev(2:1:-1, n-1, l-1)
4103  vw = ctheta*r_prev(:, n+1, l-1) - r_prev(2:1:-1, n+1, l-1)
4104  vu = vu*scal_u_n(n) + vv*scal_v_n(n) + vw*scal_w_n(n)
4105  r(:, n, l) = vu * scal_uvw_m(l)
4106  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+n)*r(1, n, l)
4107  tmp2 = tmp2 + src(ind-n)*r(2, n, l)
4108  end do
4109  dst(ind+l) = alpha * tmp1
4110  dst(ind-l) = alpha * tmp2
4111  ! Now deal with m = 0
4112  ! n = l and n = -l
4113  v = -stheta * r_prev(1, l-1, 0)
4114  u = scal_v_n(l) * scal_uvw_m(0)
4115  r(1, l, 0) = v * u
4116  tmp1 = src(ind+l) * r(1, l, 0)
4117  ! n = l-1
4118  u = ctheta * r_prev(1, l-1, 0)
4119  v = -stheta * r_prev(1, l-2, 0)
4120  w = u*scal_u_n(l-1) + v*scal_v_n(l-1)
4121  r(1, l-1, 0) = w * scal_uvw_m(0)
4122  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+l-1)*r(1, l-1, 0)
4123  ! n = 0
4124  u = ctheta * r_prev(1, 0, 0)
4125  v = -stheta * r_prev(1, 1, 0)
4126  w = u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)
4127  r(1, 0, 0) = w * scal_uvw_m(0)
4128  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind)*r(1, 0, 0)
4129  ! n = 1
4130  v = sqrt2*scal_v_n(1)*r_prev(1, 0, 0) + &
4131  & scal_w_n(1)*r_prev(1, 2, 0)
4132  u = ctheta * r_prev(1, 1, 0)
4133  w = scal_u_n(1)*u - stheta*v
4134  r(1, 1, 0) = w * scal_uvw_m(0)
4135  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+1)*r(1, 1, 0)
4136  ! n = 2..l-2
4137  !!GCC$ unroll 4
4138  do n = 2, l-2
4139  v = scal_v_n(n)*r_prev(1, n-1, 0) + &
4140  & scal_w_n(n)*r_prev(1, n+1, 0)
4141  u = ctheta * r_prev(1, n, 0)
4142  w = scal_u_n(n)*u - stheta*v
4143  r(1, n, 0) = w * scal_uvw_m(0)
4144  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+n)*r(1, n, 0)
4145  end do
4146  dst(ind) = alpha * tmp1
4147  ! Now deal with m=1..l-1 and m=1-l..-1
4148  !!GCC$ unroll 4
4149  do m = 1, l-1
4150  ! n = l and n = -l
4151  vv = -stheta * r_prev(:, l-1, m)
4152  u = scal_v_n(l) * scal_uvw_m(m)
4153  r(:, l, m) = vv * u
4154  tmp1 = src(ind+l) * r(1, l, m)
4155  tmp2 = src(ind-l) * r(2, l, m)
4156  ! n = l-1 and n = 1-l
4157  vu = ctheta * r_prev(:, l-1, m)
4158  vv = -stheta * r_prev(:, l-2, m)
4159  vw = vu*scal_u_n(l-1) + vv*scal_v_n(l-1)
4160  r(:, l-1, m) = vw * scal_uvw_m(m)
4161  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+l-1)*r(1, l-1, m)
4162  tmp2 = tmp2 + src(ind-l+1)*r(2, l-1, m)
4163  ! n = 0
4164  u = ctheta * r_prev(1, 0, m)
4165  v = -stheta * r_prev(1, 1, m)
4166  w = u*scal_u_n(0) + v*scal_v_n(0)
4167  r(1, 0, m) = w * scal_uvw_m(m)
4168  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind)*r(1, 0, m)
4169  ! n = 1
4170  v = sqrt2*scal_v_n(1)*r_prev(1, 0, m) + &
4171  & scal_w_n(1)*r_prev(1, 2, m)
4172  u = ctheta * r_prev(1, 1, m)
4173  w = scal_u_n(1)*u - stheta*v
4174  r(1, 1, m) = w * scal_uvw_m(m)
4175  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+1)*r(1, 1, m)
4176  ! n = -1
4177  u = ctheta * r_prev(2, 1, m)
4178  w = -stheta * r_prev(2, 2, m)
4179  v = u*scal_u_n(1) + w*scal_w_n(1)
4180  r(2, 1, m) = v * scal_uvw_m(m)
4181  tmp2 = tmp2 + src(ind-1)*r(2, 1, m)
4182  ! n = 2..l-2 and n = 2-l..-2
4183  !!GCC$ unroll 4
4184  do n = 2, l-2
4185  vv = scal_v_n(n)*r_prev(:, n-1, m) + &
4186  & scal_w_n(n)*r_prev(:, n+1, m)
4187  vu = ctheta * r_prev(:, n, m)
4188  vw = scal_u_n(n)*vu - stheta*vv
4189  r(:, n, m) = vw * scal_uvw_m(m)
4190  tmp1 = tmp1 + src(ind+n)*r(1, n, m)
4191  tmp2 = tmp2 + src(ind-n)*r(2, n, m)
4192  end do
4193  dst(ind+m) = alpha * tmp1
4194  dst(ind-m) = alpha * tmp2
4195  end do
4196  end do
4197  else
4198  stop "Not Implemented"
4199  end if
4200 end subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work
4201 
4224 subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
4225  & src_m, beta, dst_m)
4226  ! Inputs
4227  integer, intent(in) :: p
4228  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
4229  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
4230  ! Output
4231  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
4232  ! Temporary workspace
4233  real(dp) :: work(2*(p+1))
4234  ! Call corresponding work routine
4235  call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
4236  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
4237 end subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate
4238 
4262 subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
4263  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
4264  ! Inputs
4265  integer, intent(in) :: p
4266  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
4267  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
4268  ! Output
4269  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
4270  ! Temporary workspace
4271  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*(p+1))
4272  ! Local variables
4273  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
4274  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indjn, indjk1, indjk2
4275  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
4276  real(dp), pointer :: pow_r2(:)
4277  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
4278  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
4279  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4280  dst_m = zero
4281  else
4282  dst_m = beta * dst_m
4283  end if
4284  return
4285  end if
4286  ! Now alpha is non-zero
4287  ! If harmonics have different centers
4288  if (z .ne. 0) then
4289  ! Prepare pointers
4290  pow_r2(1:p+1) => work(1:p+1)
4291  ! Get ratios r1 and r2
4292  r1 = src_r / dst_r
4293  r2 = z / dst_r
4294  ! Get powers of ratio r2/r1
4295  r2 = r2 / r1
4296  pow_r1 = r1
4297  pow_r2(1) = one
4298  do j = 2, p+1
4299  pow_r2(j) = pow_r2(j-1) * r2
4300  end do
4301  ! Do actual M2M
4302  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
4303  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4304  do j = 0, p
4305  ! Offset for dst_m
4306  indj = j*j + j + 1
4307  ! k = 0
4308  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1 * vscales(indj)
4309  pow_r1 = pow_r1 * r1
4310  tmp2 = tmp1
4311  res1 = zero
4312  ! Offset for vcnk
4313  indjk1 = j*(j+1)/2 + 1
4314  do n = 0, j
4315  ! Offset for src_m
4316  indjn = (j-n)**2 + (j-n) + 1
4317  tmp3 = pow_r2(n+1) / &
4318  & vscales(indjn) * vcnk(indjk1+n)**2
4319  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indjn)
4320  end do
4321  dst_m(indj) = tmp2 * res1
4322  ! k != 0
4323  do k = 1, j
4324  tmp2 = tmp1
4325  res1 = zero
4326  res2 = zero
4327  ! Offsets for vcnk
4328  indjk1 = (j-k)*(j-k+1)/2 + 1
4329  indjk2 = (j+k)*(j+k+1)/2 + 1
4330  do n = 0, j-k
4331  ! Offset for src_m
4332  indjn = (j-n)**2 + (j-n) + 1
4333  tmp3 = pow_r2(n+1) / &
4334  & vscales(indjn) * vcnk(indjk1+n) * &
4335  & vcnk(indjk2+n)
4336  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indjn+k)
4337  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indjn-k)
4338  end do
4339  dst_m(indj+k) = tmp2 * res1
4340  dst_m(indj-k) = tmp2 * res2
4341  end do
4342  end do
4343  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
4344  else
4345  do j = 0, p
4346  ! Offset for dst_m
4347  indj = j*j + j + 1
4348  ! k = 0
4349  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1 * vscales(indj)
4350  pow_r1 = pow_r1 * r1
4351  tmp2 = tmp1
4352  res1 = zero
4353  ! Offset for vcnk
4354  indjk1 = j * (j+1) /2 + 1
4355  do n = 0, j
4356  ! Offset for src_m
4357  indjn = (j-n)**2 + (j-n) + 1
4358  tmp3 = pow_r2(n+1) / &
4359  & vscales(indjn) * vcnk(indjk1+n)**2
4360  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indjn)
4361  end do
4362  dst_m(indj) = beta*dst_m(indj) + tmp2*res1
4363  ! k != 0
4364  do k = 1, j
4365  tmp2 = tmp1
4366  res1 = zero
4367  res2 = zero
4368  ! Offsets for vcnk
4369  indjk1 = (j-k)*(j-k+1)/2 + 1
4370  indjk2 = (j+k)*(j+k+1)/2 + 1
4371  do n = 0, j-k
4372  ! Offset for src_m
4373  indjn = (j-n)**2 + (j-n) + 1
4374  tmp3 = pow_r2(n+1) / &
4375  & vscales(indjn) * vcnk(indjk1+n) * &
4376  & vcnk(indjk2+n)
4377  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indjn+k)
4378  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indjn-k)
4379  end do
4380  dst_m(indj+k) = beta*dst_m(indj+k) + tmp2*res1
4381  dst_m(indj-k) = beta*dst_m(indj-k) + tmp2*res2
4382  end do
4383  end do
4384  end if
4385  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
4386  else
4387  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
4388  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4389  r1 = src_r / dst_r
4390  tmp1 = alpha * r1
4391  do j = 0, p
4392  indj = j*j + j + 1
4393  do k = indj-j, indj+j
4394  dst_m(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
4395  end do
4396  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
4397  end do
4398  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
4399  else
4400  r1 = src_r / dst_r
4401  tmp1 = alpha * r1
4402  do j = 0, p
4403  indj = j*j + j + 1
4404  do k = indj-j, indj+j
4405  dst_m(k) = beta*dst_m(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
4406  end do
4407  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
4408  end do
4409  end if
4410  end if
4411 end subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_work
4412 
4435 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate(z, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
4436  & src_m, beta, dst_m)
4437  ! Inputs
4438  integer, intent(in) :: p
4439  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
4440  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
4441  ! Output
4442  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
4443  ! Temporary workspace
4444  real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
4445  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
4446  ! Call corresponding work routine
4447  call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
4448  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
4449 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate
4450 
4475 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
4476  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
4477  use complex_bessel
4478  ! Inputs
4479  integer, intent(in) :: p
4480  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
4481  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
4482  ! Output
4483  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
4484  ! Temporary workspace
4485  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
4486  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
4487  ! Local variables
4488  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
4489  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
4490  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
4491  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
4492  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
4493  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
4494  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
4495  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4496  dst_m = zero
4497  else
4498  dst_m = beta * dst_m
4499  end if
4500  return
4501  end if
4502  ! Get factorials
4503  fact(1) = one
4504  do j = 1, 2*p
4505  fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
4506  end do
4507  ! Now alpha is non-zero
4508  ! If harmonics have different centers
4509  if (z .ne. 0) then
4510  complex_argument = z
4511  call cbesi(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
4512  work(1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
4513  if (p .gt. 0) then
4514  call cbesi(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
4515  & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
4516  work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
4517  end if
4518  ! Do actual M2M
4519  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
4520  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4521  dst_m = zero
4522  do j = 0, p
4523  ! Offset for dst_m
4524  indj = j*j + j + 1
4525  ! k = 0
4526  k = 0
4527  res1 = zero
4528  do n = 0, p
4529  ! Offset for src_m
4530  indn = n*n + n + 1
4531  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * &
4532  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
4533  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_sk(j+1)
4534  tmp3 = zero
4535  do l = 0, min(j, n)
4536  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4537  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4538  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
4539  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
4540  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4541  end do
4542  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4543  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
4544  end do
4545  dst_m(indj) = res1
4546  ! k != 0
4547  do k = 1, j
4548  res1 = zero
4549  res2 = zero
4550  do n = k, p
4551  ! Offset for src_m
4552  indn = n*n + n + 1
4553  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * &
4554  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
4555  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_sk(j+1)
4556  tmp3 = zero
4557  do l = k, min(j, n)
4558  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4559  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4560  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
4561  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
4562  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4563  end do
4564  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4565  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
4566  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
4567  end do
4568  dst_m(indj+k) = res1
4569  dst_m(indj-k) = res2
4570  end do
4571  end do
4572  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
4573  else
4574  stop 111
4575  end if
4576  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
4577  else
4578  stop 222
4579  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
4580  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4581  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
4582  tmp1 = alpha * r1
4583  do j = 0, p
4584  indj = j*j + j + 1
4585  do k = indj-j, indj+j
4586  dst_m(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
4587  end do
4588  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
4589  end do
4590  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
4591  else
4592  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
4593  tmp1 = alpha * r1
4594  do j = 0, p
4595  indj = j*j + j + 1
4596  do k = indj-j, indj+j
4597  dst_m(k) = beta*dst_m(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
4598  end do
4599  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
4600  end do
4601  end if
4602  end if
4603 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work
4604 
4627 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj(z, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
4628  & src_m, beta, dst_m)
4629  ! Inputs
4630  integer, intent(in) :: p
4631  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
4632  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
4633  ! Output
4634  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
4635  ! Temporary workspace
4636  real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
4637  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
4638  ! Call corresponding work routine
4639  call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
4640  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
4641 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj
4642 
4667 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
4668  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
4669  use complex_bessel
4670  ! Inputs
4671  integer, intent(in) :: p
4672  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
4673  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
4674  ! Output
4675  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
4676  ! Temporary workspace
4677  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
4678  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
4679  ! Local variables
4680  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
4681  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
4682  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
4683  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
4684  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
4685  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
4686  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
4687  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4688  dst_m = zero
4689  else
4690  dst_m = beta * dst_m
4691  end if
4692  return
4693  end if
4694  ! Get factorials
4695  fact(1) = one
4696  do j = 1, 2*p
4697  fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
4698  end do
4699  ! Now alpha is non-zero
4700  ! If harmonics have different centers
4701  if (z .ne. 0) then
4702  complex_argument = z
4703  call cbesi(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
4704  work(1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
4705  if (p .gt. 0) then
4706  call cbesi(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
4707  & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
4708  work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
4709  end if
4710  ! Do actual M2M
4711  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
4712  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4713  dst_m = zero
4714  do n = 0, p
4715  ! Offset for dst_m
4716  indn = n*n + n + 1
4717  ! k = 0
4718  k = 0
4719  res1 = zero
4720  do j = 0, p
4721  ! Offset for src_m
4722  indj = j*j + j + 1
4723  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * &
4724  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
4725  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_sk(j+1)
4726  tmp3 = zero
4727  do l = 0, min(j, n)
4728  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4729  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4730  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
4731  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
4732  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4733  end do
4734  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4735  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj)
4736  end do
4737  dst_m(indn) = res1
4738  ! k != 0
4739  do k = 1, n
4740  res1 = zero
4741  res2 = zero
4742  do j = k, p
4743  ! Offset for src_m
4744  indj = j*j + j + 1
4745  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * &
4746  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
4747  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_sk(j+1)
4748  tmp3 = zero
4749  do l = k, min(j, n)
4750  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4751  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4752  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
4753  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
4754  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4755  end do
4756  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4757  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj+k)
4758  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indj-k)
4759  end do
4760  dst_m(indn+k) = res1
4761  dst_m(indn-k) = res2
4762  end do
4763  end do
4764  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
4765  else
4766  stop 111
4767  end if
4768  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
4769  else
4770  stop 222
4771  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
4772  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4773  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
4774  tmp1 = alpha * r1
4775  do j = 0, p
4776  indj = j*j + j + 1
4777  do k = indj-j, indj+j
4778  dst_m(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
4779  end do
4780  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
4781  end do
4782  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
4783  else
4784  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
4785  tmp1 = alpha * r1
4786  do j = 0, p
4787  indj = j*j + j + 1
4788  do k = indj-j, indj+j
4789  dst_m(k) = beta*dst_m(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
4790  end do
4791  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
4792  end do
4793  end if
4794  end if
4795 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work
4796 
4821 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(src_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
4822  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
4823  use complex_bessel
4824  ! Inputs
4825  integer, intent(in) :: p
4826  real(dp), intent(in) :: src_sk(p+2), vscales((p+2)*(p+2)), &
4827  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
4828  ! Output
4829  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+2)*(p+2))
4830  ! Temporary workspace
4831  ! Local variables
4832  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
4833  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
4834  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
4835  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1), fact2(p+2)
4836  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
4837  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
4838  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
4839  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4840  dst_m = zero
4841  else
4842  dst_m = beta * dst_m
4843  end if
4844  return
4845  end if
4846  ! Get factorials
4847  fact(1) = one
4848  do j = 1, 2*p
4849  fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
4850  end do
4851  fact2(1) = one
4852  do j = 1, p+1
4853  fact2(j+1) = dble(2*j+1) * fact2(j)
4854  end do
4855  ! Now alpha is non-zero
4856  ! Do actual M2M
4857  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
4858  if (beta .eq. zero) then
4859  dst_m = zero
4860  ! j=0, k=0, n=1, l=0
4861  j = 0
4862  k = 0
4863  n = 1
4864  l = 0
4865  indj = 1
4866  indn = 3
4867  dst_m(1) = vscales(3) / src_sk(2) / vscales(1) * src_sk(1) / fact2(2) * &
4868  & src_m(3) * alpha
4869  ! j=1..p-1
4870  do j = 1, p-1
4871  ! Offset for dst_m
4872  indj = j*j + j + 1
4873  ! k = 0
4874  k = 0
4875  res1 = zero
4876  ! n=j-1
4877  n = j-1
4878  ! Offset for src_m
4879  indn = n*n + n + 1
4880  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * &
4881  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
4882  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
4883  tmp3 = zero
4884  ! l=n
4885  l = n
4886  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4887  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4888  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/ &
4889  & fact2(j+1)
4890  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4891  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4892  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
4893  ! n=j+1
4894  n = j+1
4895  ! Offset for src_m
4896  indn = n*n + n + 1
4897  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * &
4898  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
4899  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
4900  tmp3 = zero
4901  ! l=j
4902  l = j
4903  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4904  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4905  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/ &
4906  & fact2(j+2)
4907  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4908  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4909  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
4910  dst_m(indj) = res1
4911  ! k=1..j-1
4912  do k = 1, j-1
4913  res1 = zero
4914  res2 = zero
4915  ! n=j-1
4916  n = j-1
4917  ! Offset for src_m
4918  indn = n*n + n + 1
4919  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * &
4920  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
4921  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
4922  tmp3 = zero
4923  l = n
4924  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4925  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4926  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/ &
4927  & fact2(j+1)
4928  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4929  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4930  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
4931  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
4932  ! n=j+1
4933  n = j+1
4934  ! Offset for src_m
4935  indn = n*n + n + 1
4936  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * &
4937  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
4938  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
4939  tmp3 = zero
4940  l = j
4941  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4942  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4943  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/ &
4944  & fact2(j+2)
4945  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4946  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4947  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
4948  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
4949  dst_m(indj+k) = res1
4950  dst_m(indj-k) = res2
4951  end do
4952  ! k=j
4953  k = j
4954  res1 = zero
4955  res2 = zero
4956  ! n=j+1
4957  n = j+1
4958  ! Offset for src_m
4959  indn = n*n + n + 1
4960  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * &
4961  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
4962  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
4963  tmp3 = zero
4964  l = j
4965  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4966  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4967  & fact(l+1)/ &
4968  & fact2(j+2)
4969  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4970  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4971  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
4972  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
4973  dst_m(indj+k) = res1
4974  dst_m(indj-k) = res2
4975  end do
4976  ! j=p, n=p-1, l=p-1
4977  j = p
4978  n = p-1
4979  ! Offset for dst_m
4980  indj = j*j + j + 1
4981  ! k = 0
4982  k = 0
4983  res1 = zero
4984  ! Offset for src_m
4985  indn = n*n + n + 1
4986  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * &
4987  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
4988  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
4989  tmp3 = zero
4990  l = p-1
4991  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
4992  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
4993  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/ &
4994  & fact2(j+1)
4995  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
4996  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
4997  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
4998  dst_m(indj) = res1
4999  ! k=1..p-1
5000  do k = 1, p-1
5001  res1 = zero
5002  res2 = zero
5003  ! n=j-1
5004  n = j-1
5005  ! Offset for src_m
5006  indn = n*n + n + 1
5007  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * &
5008  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
5009  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
5010  tmp3 = zero
5011  l = n
5012  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
5013  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
5014  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)/ &
5015  & fact2(j+1)
5016  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
5017  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
5018  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
5019  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
5020  dst_m(indj+k) = res1
5021  dst_m(indj-k) = res2
5022  end do
5023  ! j=p,k=p is impossible because n=p-1 or n=p+1 is impossible
5024  ! j=p+1, n=p, l=p
5025  j = p+1
5026  n = p
5027  ! Offset for dst_m
5028  indj = j*j + j + 1
5029  ! k = 0
5030  k = 0
5031  res1 = zero
5032  ! Offset for src_m
5033  indn = n*n + n + 1
5034  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * &
5035  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
5036  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
5037  tmp3 = zero
5038  l = n
5039  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
5040  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
5041  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)/ &
5042  & fact2(j+1)
5043  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
5044  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
5045  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
5046  dst_m(indj) = res1
5047  ! k != 0
5048  do k = 1, p
5049  res1 = zero
5050  res2 = zero
5051  ! n=j-1
5052  n = p
5053  ! Offset for src_m
5054  indn = n*n + n + 1
5055  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * &
5056  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
5057  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * src_sk(j+1) * alpha
5058  tmp3 = zero
5059  l = n
5060  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
5061  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
5062  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)/ &
5063  & fact2(j+1)
5064  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
5065  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
5066  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
5067  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
5068  dst_m(indj+k) = res1
5069  dst_m(indj-k) = res2
5070  end do
5071  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
5072  else
5073  stop 111
5074  end if
5075 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work
5076 
5099 subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5100  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
5101  ! Inputs
5102  integer, intent(in) :: p
5103  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5104  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5105  ! Output
5106  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5107  ! Temporary workspace
5108  real(dp) :: work(2*(p+1))
5109  ! Call corresponding work routine
5110  call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5111  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5112 end subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj
5113 
5137 subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5138  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5139  ! Inputs
5140  integer, intent(in) :: p
5141  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5142  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5143  ! Output
5144  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5145  ! Temporary workspace
5146  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*(p+1))
5147  ! Local variables
5148  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, res1, res2
5149  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, indjk1, indjk2
5150  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
5151  real(dp), pointer :: pow_r1(:), pow_r2(:)
5152  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
5153  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
5154  if (beta .eq. zero) then
5155  dst_m = zero
5156  else
5157  dst_m = beta * dst_m
5158  end if
5159  return
5160  end if
5161  ! If harmonics have different centers
5162  if (z .ne. 0) then
5163  ! Prepare pointers
5164  pow_r1(1:p+1) => work(1:p+1)
5165  pow_r2(1:p+1) => work(p+2:2*(p+1))
5166  ! Get powers of r1 and r2
5167  r1 = dst_r / src_r
5168  r2 = -z / src_r
5169  pow_r1(1) = r1
5170  pow_r2(1) = one
5171  do j = 2, p+1
5172  pow_r1(j) = pow_r1(j-1) * r1
5173  pow_r2(j) = pow_r2(j-1) * r2
5174  end do
5175  ! Do actual adjoint M2M
5176  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
5177  if (beta .eq. zero) then
5178  do n = 0, p
5179  ! Offset for dst_m
5180  indn = n*n + n + 1
5181  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1(n+1) / vscales(indn)
5182  ! k = 0
5183  res1 = zero
5184  do j = n, p
5185  ! Offset for src_m
5186  indj = j*j + j + 1
5187  ! Offsets for vcnk
5188  indjk1 = j*(j+1)/2 + 1
5189  tmp2 = tmp1 * vscales(indj) * pow_r2(j-n+1) * &
5190  & vcnk(indjk1+j-n)**2
5191  res1 = res1 + tmp2*src_m(indj)
5192  end do
5193  dst_m(indn) = res1
5194  ! k != 1
5195  do k = 1, n
5196  res1 = zero
5197  res2 = zero
5198  do j = n, p
5199  ! Offset for src_m
5200  indj = j*j + j + 1
5201  ! Offsets for vcnk
5202  indjk1 = (j-k)*(j-k+1)/2 + 1
5203  indjk2 = (j+k)*(j+k+1)/2 + 1
5204  tmp2 = tmp1 * vscales(indj) * pow_r2(j-n+1) * &
5205  & vcnk(indjk1+j-n) * vcnk(indjk2+j-n)
5206  res1 = res1 + tmp2*src_m(indj+k)
5207  res2 = res2 + tmp2*src_m(indj-k)
5208  end do
5209  dst_m(indn+k) = res1
5210  dst_m(indn-k) = res2
5211  end do
5212  end do
5213  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
5214  else
5215  do n = 0, p
5216  ! Offset for dst_m
5217  indn = n*n + n + 1
5218  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1(n+1) / vscales(indn)
5219  ! k = 0
5220  res1 = zero
5221  do j = n, p
5222  ! Offset for src_m
5223  indj = j*j + j + 1
5224  ! Offsets for vcnk
5225  indjk1 = j*(j+1)/2 + 1
5226  tmp2 = tmp1 * vscales(indj) * pow_r2(j-n+1) * &
5227  & vcnk(indjk1+j-n)**2
5228  res1 = res1 + tmp2*src_m(indj)
5229  end do
5230  dst_m(indn) = beta*dst_m(indn) + res1
5231  ! k != 1
5232  do k = 1, n
5233  res1 = zero
5234  res2 = zero
5235  do j = n, p
5236  ! Offset for src_m
5237  indj = j*j + j + 1
5238  ! Offsets for vcnk
5239  indjk1 = (j-k)*(j-k+1)/2 + 1
5240  indjk2 = (j+k)*(j+k+1)/2 + 1
5241  tmp2 = tmp1 * vscales(indj) * pow_r2(j-n+1) * &
5242  & vcnk(indjk1+j-n) * vcnk(indjk2+j-n)
5243  res1 = res1 + tmp2*src_m(indj+k)
5244  res2 = res2 + tmp2*src_m(indj-k)
5245  end do
5246  dst_m(indn+k) = beta*dst_m(indn+k) + res1
5247  dst_m(indn-k) = beta*dst_m(indn-k) + res2
5248  end do
5249  end do
5250  end if
5251  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
5252  else
5253  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
5254  if (beta .eq. zero) then
5255  r1 = dst_r / src_r
5256  tmp1 = alpha * r1
5257  do j = 0, p
5258  indj = j*j + j + 1
5259  res1 = zero
5260  do k = indj-j, indj+j
5261  dst_m(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
5262  end do
5263  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
5264  end do
5265  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
5266  else
5267  r1 = dst_r / src_r
5268  tmp1 = alpha * r1
5269  do j = 0, p
5270  indj = j*j + j + 1
5271  res1 = zero
5272  do k = indj-j, indj+j
5273  dst_m(k) = beta*dst_m(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
5274  end do
5275  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
5276  end do
5277  end if
5278  end if
5279 end subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj_work
5280 
5300 subroutine fmm_m2m_scale(src_r, dst_r, p, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
5301  ! Inputs
5302  integer, intent(in) :: p
5303  real(dp), intent(in) :: src_r, dst_r, alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5304  ! Output
5305  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5306  ! Local variables
5307  real(dp) :: r1, tmp1
5308  integer :: j, k, indj
5309  ! Init output
5310  if (beta .eq. zero) then
5311  dst_m = zero
5312  else
5313  dst_m = beta * dst_m
5314  end if
5315  r1 = src_r / dst_r
5316  tmp1 = alpha * r1
5317  do j = 0, p
5318  indj = j*j + j + 1
5319  do k = indj-j, indj+j
5320  dst_m(k) = dst_m(k) + src_m(k)*tmp1
5321  end do
5322  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
5323  end do
5324 end subroutine fmm_m2m_scale
5325 
5346 subroutine fmm_m2m_scale_adj(src_r, dst_r, p, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
5347  ! Inputs
5348  integer, intent(in) :: p
5349  real(dp), intent(in) :: src_r, dst_r, alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5350  ! Output
5351  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5352  ! Local variables
5353  real(dp) :: r1, tmp1
5354  integer :: j, k, indj
5355  ! Init output
5356  if (beta .eq. zero) then
5357  dst_m = zero
5358  else
5359  dst_m = beta * dst_m
5360  end if
5361  r1 = dst_r / src_r
5362  tmp1 = alpha * r1
5363  do j = 0, p
5364  indj = j*j + j + 1
5365  do k = indj-j, indj+j
5366  dst_m(k) = dst_m(k) + src_m(k)*tmp1
5367  end do
5368  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
5369  end do
5370 end subroutine fmm_m2m_scale_adj
5371 
5397 subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5398  & src_m, beta, dst_m)
5399  ! Inputs
5400  integer, intent(in) :: p
5401  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5402  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5403  ! Output
5404  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5405  ! Temporary workspace
5406  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
5407  ! Call corresponding work routine
5408  call fmm_m2m_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5409  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5410 end subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation
5411 
5438 subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5439  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5440  ! Inputs
5441  integer, intent(in) :: p
5442  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5443  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5444  ! Output
5445  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5446  ! Temporary workspace
5447  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
5448  ! Local variables
5449  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
5450  integer :: m, n
5451  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
5452  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
5453  ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
5454  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
5455  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
5456  if (stheta .eq. zero) then
5457  ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5458  call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5459  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5460  return
5461  end if
5462  ! Prepare pointers
5463  m = (p+1)**2
5464  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
5465  tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
5466  n = n + m
5467  tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
5468  n = n + m
5469  m = p + 1
5470  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
5471  n = n + m
5472  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
5473  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
5474  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
5475  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5476  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
5477  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5478  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
5479  & tmp_m2, work)
5480  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5481  call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, one, &
5482  & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work)
5483  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5484  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
5485  & work)
5486  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5487  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_m)
5488 end subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_work
5489 
5515 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5516  & src_m, beta, dst_m)
5517  use complex_bessel
5518  ! Inputs
5519  integer, intent(in) :: p
5520  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5521  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
5522  ! Output
5523  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5524  ! Temporary workspace
5525  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), s1, s2, ck(3)
5526  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
5527  integer :: NZ, ierr
5528  ! Compute Bessel functions
5529  z1 = src_r * kappa
5530  z2 = dst_r * kappa
5531  s1 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z1)))
5532  s2 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z2)))
5533  call cbesk(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
5534  src_sk(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
5535  call cbesk(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
5536  dst_sk(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
5537  if (p .gt. 0) then
5538  call cbesk(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
5539  src_sk(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
5540  call cbesk(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
5541  dst_sk(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
5542  end if
5543  ! Call corresponding work routine
5544  ck = c*kappa
5545  call fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_work(ck, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5546  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
5547 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation
5548 
5575 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_work(c, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5576  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
5577  ! Inputs
5578  integer, intent(in) :: p
5579  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5580  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5581  ! Output
5582  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5583  ! Temporary workspace
5584  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
5585  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
5586  ! Local variables
5587  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
5588  integer :: m, n
5589  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
5590  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
5591  ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
5592  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
5593  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
5594  !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
5595  ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5596  ! call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5597  ! & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5598  ! return
5599  !end if
5600  ! Prepare pointers
5601  m = (p+1)**2
5602  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
5603  tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
5604  n = n + m
5605  tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
5606  n = n + m
5607  m = p + 1
5608  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
5609  n = n + m
5610  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
5611  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
5612  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
5613  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5614  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
5615  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5616  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
5617  & tmp_m2, work)
5618  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5619  call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(rho, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, one, &
5620  & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work, work_complex)
5621  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5622  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
5623  & work)
5624  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5625  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_m)
5626 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_work
5627 
5653 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, &
5654  & vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
5655  use complex_bessel
5656  ! Inputs
5657  integer, intent(in) :: p
5658  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5659  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
5660  ! Output
5661  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5662  ! Temporary workspace
5663  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), s1, s2, ck(3)
5664  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
5665  integer :: NZ, ierr
5666  ! Compute Bessel functions
5667  z1 = src_r * kappa
5668  z2 = dst_r * kappa
5669  s1 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z1)))
5670  s2 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z2)))
5671  call cbesk(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
5672  src_sk(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
5673  call cbesk(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
5674  dst_sk(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
5675  if (p .gt. 0) then
5676  call cbesk(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
5677  src_sk(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
5678  call cbesk(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
5679  dst_sk(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
5680  end if
5681  ! Call corresponding work routine
5682  ck = -c*kappa
5683  call fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_adj_work(ck, dst_sk, src_sk, p, vscales, &
5684  & vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
5685 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_adj
5686 
5713 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_adj_work(c, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5714  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work, work_complex)
5715  ! Inputs
5716  integer, intent(in) :: p
5717  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_sk(p+1), dst_sk(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5718  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5719  ! Output
5720  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5721  ! Temporary workspace
5722  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
5723  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
5724  ! Local variables
5725  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
5726  integer :: m, n
5727  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
5728  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
5729  ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
5730  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
5731  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
5732  !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
5733  ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5734  ! call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5735  ! & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5736  ! return
5737  !end if
5738  ! Prepare pointers
5739  m = (p+1)**2
5740  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
5741  tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
5742  n = n + m
5743  tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
5744  n = n + m
5745  m = p + 1
5746  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
5747  n = n + m
5748  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
5749  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
5750  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
5751  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5752  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
5753  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5754  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
5755  & tmp_m2, work)
5756  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5757  call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, one, &
5758  & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work, work_complex)
5759  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5760  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
5761  & work)
5762  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5763  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_m)
5764 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_adj_work
5765 
5789 subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5790  & src_m, beta, dst_m)
5791  ! Inputs
5792  integer, intent(in) :: p
5793  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5794  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5795  ! Output
5796  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5797  ! Temporary workspace
5798  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
5799  ! Call corresponding work routine
5800  call fmm_m2m_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
5801  & src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5802 end subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj
5803 
5828 subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5829  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5830  ! Inputs
5831  integer, intent(in) :: p
5832  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5833  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5834  ! Output
5835  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
5836  ! Temporary workspace
5837  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
5838  ! Local variables
5839  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
5840  integer :: m, n
5841  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
5842  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
5843  ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
5844  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
5845  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
5846  if (stheta .eq. 0) then
5847  ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5848  call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, &
5849  & vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
5850  return
5851  end if
5852  ! Prepare pointers
5853  m = (p+1)**2
5854  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
5855  tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
5856  n = n + m
5857  tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
5858  n = n + m
5859  m = p + 1
5860  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
5861  n = n + m
5862  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
