5863  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
5864  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
5865  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5866  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
5867  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5868  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
5869  & tmp_m2, work)
5870  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
5871  call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5872  & one, tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work)
5873  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
5874  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
5875  & work)
5876  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
5877  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_m)
5878 end subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj_work
5879 
5880 subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_grad(p, sph_sk, vscales, vcnk, sph_m, sph_m_grad)
5881  !! Inputs
5882  integer, intent(in) :: p
5883  real(dp), intent(in) :: sph_sk(p+2), vscales((p+2)**2), vcnk((2*p+3)*(p+2)), &
5884  & sph_m((p+1)**2)
5885  !! Output
5886  real(dp), intent(out) :: sph_m_grad((p+2)**2, 3)
5887  !! Local variables
5888  real(dp), dimension(3, 3) :: zx_coord_transform, zy_coord_transform
5889  real(dp) :: tmp((p+1)**2), tmp2((p+2)**2)
5890  ! Set coordinate transformations
5891  zx_coord_transform = zero
5892  zx_coord_transform(3, 2) = one
5893  zx_coord_transform(2, 3) = one
5894  zx_coord_transform(1, 1) = one
5895  zy_coord_transform = zero
5896  zy_coord_transform(1, 2) = one
5897  zy_coord_transform(2, 1) = one
5898  zy_coord_transform(3, 3) = one
5899  ! Transform input harmonics for OX axis
5900  call fmm_sph_transform(p, zx_coord_transform, one, sph_m, zero, tmp)
5901  ! Differentiate M2M along OZ
5902  call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5903  & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
5904  ! Transform into output harmonics for OX axis
5905  call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zx_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
5906  & sph_m_grad(:, 1))
5907  ! Transform input harmonics for OY axis
5908  call fmm_sph_transform(p, zy_coord_transform, one, sph_m, zero, tmp)
5909  ! Differentiate M2M along OZ
5910  call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5911  & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
5912  ! Transform into output harmonics for OY axis
5913  call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zy_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
5914  & sph_m_grad(:, 2))
5915  ! Differentiate for OZ axis
5916  call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, &
5917  & one, sph_m, zero, sph_m_grad(:, 3))
5918 end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_grad
5919 
5942 subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
5943  & src_l, beta, dst_l)
5944  ! Inputs
5945  integer, intent(in) :: p
5946  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5947  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5948  ! Output
5949  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
5950  ! Temporary workspace
5951  real(dp) :: work(2*(p+1))
5952  ! Call corresponding work routine
5953  call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
5954  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
5955 end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate
5956 
5980 subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
5981  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
5982  ! Inputs
5983  integer, intent(in) :: p
5984  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
5985  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
5986  ! Output
5987  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
5988  ! Temporary workspace
5989  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*(p+1))
5990  ! Local variables
5991  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2
5992  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn
5993  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
5994  real(dp), pointer :: pow_r1(:), pow_r2(:)
5995  ! Init output
5996  if (beta .eq. zero) then
5997  dst_l = zero
5998  else
5999  dst_l = beta * dst_l
6000  end if
6001  ! If harmonics have different centers
6002  if (z .ne. 0) then
6003  ! Prepare pointers
6004  pow_r1(1:p+1) => work(1:p+1)
6005  pow_r2(1:p+1) => work(p+2:2*(p+1))
6006  ! Get powers of r1 and r2
6007  r1 = z / src_r
6008  r2 = dst_r / z
6009  pow_r1(1) = 1
6010  pow_r2(1) = 1
6011  do j = 2, p+1
6012  pow_r1(j) = pow_r1(j-1) * r1
6013  pow_r2(j) = pow_r2(j-1) * r2
6014  end do
6015  ! Do actual L2L
6016  do j = 0, p
6017  indj = j*j + j + 1
6018  do k = 0, j
6019  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r2(j+1) / vfact(j-k+1) / vfact(j+k+1) * &
6020  & vscales(indj)
6021  do n = j, p
6022  indn = n*n + n + 1
6023  tmp2 = tmp1 * pow_r1(n+1) / vscales(indn) * &
6024  & vfact(n-k+1) * vfact(n+k+1) / vfact(n-j+1) / &
6025  & vfact(n-j+1)
6026  if (mod(n+j, 2) .eq. 1) then
6027  tmp2 = -tmp2
6028  end if
6029  if (k .eq. 0) then
6030  dst_l(indj) = dst_l(indj) + tmp2*src_l(indn)
6031  else
6032  dst_l(indj+k) = dst_l(indj+k) + tmp2*src_l(indn+k)
6033  dst_l(indj-k) = dst_l(indj-k) + tmp2*src_l(indn-k)
6034  end if
6035  end do
6036  end do
6037  end do
6038  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6039  else
6040  r1 = dst_r / src_r
6041  tmp1 = alpha
6042  do j = 0, p
6043  indj = j*j + j + 1
6044  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6045  dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
6046  end do
6047  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6048  end do
6049  end if
6050 end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work
6051 
6074 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
6075  & src_l, beta, dst_l)
6076  ! Inputs
6077  integer, intent(in) :: p
6078  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6079  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6080  ! Output
6081  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6082  ! Temporary workspace
6083  real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
6084  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6085  ! Call corresponding work routine
6086  call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6087  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6088 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate
6089 
6114 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6115  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6116  use complex_bessel
6117  ! Inputs
6118  integer, intent(in) :: p
6119  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6120  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6121  ! Output
6122  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6123  ! Temporary workspace
6124  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
6125  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6126  ! Local variables
6127  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
6128  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
6129  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6130  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
6131  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
6132  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
6133  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
6134  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6135  dst_l = zero
6136  else
6137  dst_l = beta * dst_l
6138  end if
6139  return
6140  end if
6141  ! Get factorials
6142  fact(1) = one
6143  do j = 1, 2*p
6144  fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
6145  end do
6146  ! Now alpha is non-zero
6147  ! If harmonics have different centers
6148  if (z .ne. 0) then
6149  complex_argument = z
6150  call cbesi(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
6151  work(1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
6152  if (p .gt. 0) then
6153  call cbesi(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
6154  & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
6155  work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
6156  end if
6157  ! Do actual M2M
6158  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6159  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6160  dst_l = zero
6161  do j = 0, p
6162  ! Offset for dst_l
6163  indj = j*j + j + 1
6164  ! k = 0
6165  k = 0
6166  res1 = zero
6167  do n = 0, p
6168  ! Offset for src_l
6169  indn = n*n + n + 1
6170  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6171  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6172  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6173  tmp3 = zero
6174  do l = 0, min(j, n)
6175  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6176  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6177  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6178  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6179  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6180  end do
6181  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6182  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn)
6183  end do
6184  dst_l(indj) = res1
6185  ! k != 0
6186  do k = 1, j
6187  res1 = zero
6188  res2 = zero
6189  do n = k, p
6190  ! Offset for src_l
6191  indn = n*n + n + 1
6192  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6193  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6194  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6195  tmp3 = zero
6196  do l = k, min(j, n)
6197  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6198  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6199  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6200  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6201  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6202  end do
6203  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6204  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn+k)
6205  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indn-k)
6206  end do
6207  dst_l(indj+k) = res1
6208  dst_l(indj-k) = res2
6209  end do
6210  end do
6211  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6212  else
6213  do j = 0, p
6214  ! Offset for dst_l
6215  indj = j*j + j + 1
6216  ! k = 0
6217  k = 0
6218  res1 = zero
6219  do n = 0, p
6220  ! Offset for src_l
6221  indn = n*n + n + 1
6222  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6223  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6224  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6225  tmp3 = zero
6226  do l = 0, min(j, n)
6227  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6228  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6229  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6230  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6231  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6232  end do
6233  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6234  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn)
6235  end do
6236  dst_l(indj) = beta*dst_l(indj) + res1
6237  ! k != 0
6238  do k = 1, j
6239  res1 = zero
6240  res2 = zero
6241  do n = k, p
6242  ! Offset for src_l
6243  indn = n*n + n + 1
6244  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6245  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6246  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6247  tmp3 = zero
6248  do l = k, min(j, n)
6249  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6250  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6251  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6252  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6253  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6254  end do
6255  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6256  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn+k)
6257  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indn-k)
6258  end do
6259  dst_l(indj+k) = beta*dst_l(indj+k) + res1
6260  dst_l(indj-k) = beta*dst_l(indj-k) + res2
6261  end do
6262  end do
6263  end if
6264  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6265  else
6266  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6267  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6268  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6269  tmp1 = alpha * r1
6270  do j = 0, p
6271  indj = j*j + j + 1
6272  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6273  dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_l(k)
6274  end do
6275  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6276  end do
6277  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6278  else
6279  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6280  tmp1 = alpha * r1
6281  do j = 0, p
6282  indj = j*j + j + 1
6283  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6284  dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_l(k)
6285  end do
6286  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6287  end do
6288  end if
6289  end if
6290 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work
6291 
6314 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
6315  & src_l, beta, dst_l)
6316  ! Inputs
6317  integer, intent(in) :: p
6318  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6319  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6320  ! Output
6321  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6322  ! Temporary workspace
6323  real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
6324  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6325  ! Call corresponding work routine
6326  call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6327  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6328 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj
6329 
6354 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6355  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6356  use complex_bessel
6357  ! Inputs
6358  integer, intent(in) :: p
6359  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6360  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6361  ! Output
6362  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6363  ! Temporary workspace
6364  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
6365  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6366  ! Local variables
6367  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
6368  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
6369  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6370  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
6371  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
6372  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
6373  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
6374  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6375  dst_l = zero
6376  else
6377  dst_l = beta * dst_l
6378  end if
6379  return
6380  end if
6381  ! Get factorials
6382  fact(1) = one
6383  do j = 1, 2*p
6384  fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
6385  end do
6386  ! Now alpha is non-zero
6387  ! If harmonics have different centers
6388  if (z .ne. 0) then
6389  complex_argument = z
6390  call cbesi(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
6391  work(1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
6392  if (p .gt. 0) then
6393  call cbesi(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
6394  & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
6395  work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
6396  end if
6397  ! Do actual M2M
6398  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6399  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6400  dst_l = zero
6401  do n = 0, p
6402  ! Offset for dst_l
6403  indn = n*n + n + 1
6404  ! k = 0
6405  k = 0
6406  res1 = zero
6407  do j = 0, p
6408  ! Offset for src_l
6409  indj = j*j + j + 1
6410  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6411  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6412  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6413  tmp3 = zero
6414  do l = 0, min(j, n)
6415  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6416  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6417  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6418  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6419  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6420  end do
6421  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6422  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj)
6423  end do
6424  dst_l(indn) = res1
6425  ! k != 0
6426  do k = 1, n
6427  res1 = zero
6428  res2 = zero
6429  do j = k, p
6430  ! Offset for src_l
6431  indj = j*j + j + 1
6432  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6433  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6434  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6435  tmp3 = zero
6436  do l = k, min(j, n)
6437  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6438  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6439  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6440  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6441  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6442  end do
6443  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6444  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj+k)
6445  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indj-k)
6446  end do
6447  dst_l(indn+k) = res1
6448  dst_l(indn-k) = res2
6449  end do
6450  end do
6451  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6452  else
6453  do n = 0, p
6454  ! Offset for dst_l
6455  indn = n*n + n + 1
6456  ! k = 0
6457  k = 0
6458  res1 = zero
6459  do j = 0, p
6460  ! Offset for src_l
6461  indj = j*j + j + 1
6462  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6463  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6464  !& src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6465  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6466  tmp3 = zero
6467  do l = 0, min(j, n)
6468  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6469  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6470  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6471  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6472  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6473  end do
6474  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6475  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj)
6476  end do
6477  dst_l(indn) = beta*dst_l(indn) + res1
6478  ! k != 0
6479  do k = 1, n
6480  res1 = zero
6481  res2 = zero
6482  do j = k, p
6483  ! Offset for src_l
6484  indj = j*j + j + 1
6485  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6486  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6487  & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6488  tmp3 = zero
6489  do l = k, min(j, n)
6490  tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6491  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6492  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6493  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6494  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6495  end do
6496  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6497  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj+k)
6498  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indj-k)
6499  end do
6500  dst_l(indn+k) = beta*dst_l(indn+k) + res1
6501  dst_l(indn-k) = beta*dst_l(indn-k) + res2
6502  end do
6503  end do
6504  end if
6505  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6506  else
6507  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6508  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6509  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6510  tmp1 = alpha * r1
6511  do j = 0, p
6512  indj = j*j + j + 1
6513  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6514  dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_l(k)
6515  end do
6516  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6517  end do
6518  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6519  else
6520  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6521  tmp1 = alpha * r1
6522  do j = 0, p
6523  indj = j*j + j + 1
6524  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6525  dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_l(k)
6526  end do
6527  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6528  end do
6529  end if
6530  end if
6531 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work
6532 
6557 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(src_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6558  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6559  use complex_bessel
6560  ! Inputs
6561  integer, intent(in) :: p
6562  real(dp), intent(in) :: src_si(p+2), vscales((p+2)*(p+2)), &
6563  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6564  ! Output
6565  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+2)*(p+2))
6566  ! Temporary workspace
6567  ! Local variables
6568  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
6569  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
6570  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6571  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1), fact2(p+2)
6572  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
6573  ! Derivative of the L2L is just a negative derivative of the M2M
6574  call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(src_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6575  & -alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6576 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work
6577 
6600 subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
6601  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6602  ! Inputs
6603  integer, intent(in) :: p
6604  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6605  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6606  ! Output
6607  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6608  ! Temporary workspace
6609  real(dp) :: work(2*(p+1))
6610  ! Call corresponding work routine
6611  call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
6612  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6613 end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj
6614 
6638 subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
6639  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6640  ! Inputs
6641  integer, intent(in) :: p
6642  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6643  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6644  ! Output
6645  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6646  ! Temporary workspace
6647  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*(p+1))
6648  ! Local variables
6649  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2
6650  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn
6651  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6652  real(dp), pointer :: pow_r1(:), pow_r2(:)
6653  ! Init output
6654  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6655  dst_l = zero
6656  else
6657  dst_l = beta * dst_l
6658  end if
6659  ! If harmonics have different centers
6660  if (z .ne. 0) then
6661  ! Prepare pointers
6662  pow_r1(1:p+1) => work(1:p+1)
6663  pow_r2(1:p+1) => work(p+2:2*(p+1))
6664  ! Get powers of r1 and r2
6665  r1 = -z / dst_r
6666  r2 = -src_r / z
6667  pow_r1(1) = one
6668  pow_r2(1) = one
6669  do j = 2, p+1
6670  pow_r1(j) = pow_r1(j-1) * r1
6671  pow_r2(j) = pow_r2(j-1) * r2
6672  end do
6673  do j = 0, p
6674  indj = j*j + j + 1
6675  do k = 0, j
6676  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r2(j+1) / vfact(j-k+1) / vfact(j+k+1) * &
6677  & vscales(indj)
6678  do n = j, p
6679  indn = n*n + n + 1
6680  tmp2 = tmp1 * pow_r1(n+1) / vscales(indn) * &
6681  & vfact(n-k+1) * vfact(n+k+1) / vfact(n-j+1) / &
6682  & vfact(n-j+1)
6683  if (mod(n+j, 2) .eq. 1) then
6684  tmp2 = -tmp2
6685  end if
6686  if (k .eq. 0) then
6687  dst_l(indn) = dst_l(indn) + tmp2*src_l(indj)
6688  else
6689  dst_l(indn+k) = dst_l(indn+k) + tmp2*src_l(indj+k)
6690  dst_l(indn-k) = dst_l(indn-k) + tmp2*src_l(indj-k)
6691  end if
6692  end do
6693  end do
6694  end do
6695  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6696  else
6697  r1 = src_r / dst_r
6698  tmp1 = alpha
6699  do j = 0, p
6700  indj = j*j + j + 1
6701  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6702  dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
6703  end do
6704  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6705  end do
6706  end if
6707 end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work
6708 
6728 subroutine fmm_l2l_scale(src_r, dst_r, p, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6729  ! Inputs
6730  integer, intent(in) :: p
6731  real(dp), intent(in) :: src_r, dst_r, alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6732  ! Output
6733  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6734  ! Local variables
6735  real(dp) :: r1, tmp1
6736  integer :: j, k, indj
6737  ! Init output
6738  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6739  dst_l = zero
6740  else
6741  dst_l = beta * dst_l
6742  end if
6743  r1 = dst_r / src_r
6744  tmp1 = alpha
6745  do j = 0, p
6746  indj = j*j + j + 1
6747  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6748  dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
6749  end do
6750  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6751  end do
6752 end subroutine fmm_l2l_scale
6753 
6773 subroutine fmm_l2l_scale_adj(src_r, dst_r, p, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6774  ! Inputs
6775  integer, intent(in) :: p
6776  real(dp), intent(in) :: src_r, dst_r, alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6777  ! Output
6778  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6779  ! Local variables
6780  real(dp) :: r1, tmp1
6781  integer :: j, k, indj
6782  ! Init output
6783  if (beta .eq. zero) then
6784  dst_l = zero
6785  else
6786  dst_l = beta * dst_l
6787  end if
6788  r1 = src_r / dst_r
6789  tmp1 = alpha
6790  do j = 0, p
6791  indj = j*j + j + 1
6792  do k = indj-j, indj+j
6793  dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
6794  end do
6795  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6796  end do
6797 end subroutine fmm_l2l_scale_adj
6798 
6824 subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
6825  & src_l, beta, dst_l)
6826  ! Inputs
6827  integer, intent(in) :: p
6828  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6829  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6830  ! Output
6831  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6832  ! Temporary workspace
6833  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p+19*p+8)
6834  ! Call corresponding work routine
6835  call fmm_l2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
6836  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6837 end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation
6838 
6865 subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
6866  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6867  ! Inputs
6868  integer, intent(in) :: p
6869  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6870  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6871  ! Output
6872  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6873  ! Temporary workspace
6874  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
6875  ! Local variables
6876  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
6877  integer :: m, n
6878  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
6879  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
6880  ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
6881  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
6882  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
6883  if (stheta .eq. zero) then
6884  ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
6885  call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
6886  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6887  return
6888  end if
6889  ! Prepare pointers
6890  m = (p+1)**2
6891  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
6892  tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
6893  n = n + m
6894  tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
6895  n = n + m
6896  m = p + 1
6897  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
6898  n = n + m
6899  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
6900  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
6901  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
6902  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
6903  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
6904  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
6905  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
6906  & tmp_l2, work)
6907  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
6908  call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, one, &
6909  & tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work)
6910  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
6911  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
6912  & work)
6913  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
6914  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
6915 end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_work
6916 
6942 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
6943  & src_l, beta, dst_l)
6944  use complex_bessel
6945  ! Inputs
6946  integer, intent(in) :: p
6947  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6948  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
6949  ! Output
6950  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6951  ! Temporary workspace
6952  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2
6953  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
6954  integer :: NZ, ierr
6955  ! Compute Bessel functions
6956  z1 = src_r * kappa
6957  z2 = dst_r * kappa
6958  s1 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z1)))
6959  s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
6960  call cbesi(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
6961  src_si(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
6962  call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
6963  dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
6964  if (p .gt. 0) then
6965  call cbesi(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
6966  src_si(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
6967  call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
6968  dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
6969  end if
6970  ! Call corresponding work routine
6971  call fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_work(c*kappa, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
6972  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6973 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation
6974 
7001 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_work(c, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
7002  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7003  ! Inputs
7004  integer, intent(in) :: p
7005  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7006  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7007  ! Output
7008  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7009  ! Temporary workspace
7010  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7011  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
7012  ! Local variables
7013  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7014  integer :: m, n
7015  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7016  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7017  ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7018  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7019  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7020  !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7021  ! call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(abs(c(3)), src_si, dst_si, p, &
7022  ! & vscales, vcnk, one, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7023  ! return
7024  !end if
7025  ! Prepare pointers
7026  m = (p+1)**2
7027  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7028  tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7029  n = n + m
7030  tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7031  n = n + m
7032  m = p + 1
7033  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7034  n = n + m
7035  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7036  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7037  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7038  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7039  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
7040  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7041  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
7042  & tmp_l2, work)
7043  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7044  call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(rho, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
7045  & vcnk, one, tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work, work_complex)
7046  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7047  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
7048  & work)
7049  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7050  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
7051 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_work
7052 
7078 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
7079  & src_l, beta, dst_l)
7080  use complex_bessel
7081  ! Inputs
7082  integer, intent(in) :: p
7083  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7084  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
7085  ! Output
7086  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7087  ! Temporary workspace
7088  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2
7089  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
7090  integer :: NZ, ierr
7091  ! Compute Bessel functions
7092  z1 = src_r * kappa
7093  z2 = dst_r * kappa
7094  s1 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z1)))
7095  s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
7096  call cbesi(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7097  src_si(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
7098  call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7099  dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
7100  if (p .gt. 0) then
7101  call cbesi(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7102  src_si(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7103  call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7104  dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7105  end if
7106  ! Call corresponding work routine
7107  call fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(-c*kappa, dst_si, src_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
7108  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7109 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj
7110 
7137 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(c, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
7138  & vcnk, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7139  ! Inputs
7140  integer, intent(in) :: p
7141  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7142  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7143  ! Output
7144  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7145  ! Temporary workspace
7146  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7147  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
7148  ! Local variables
7149  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7150  integer :: m, n
7151  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7152  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7153  ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7154  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7155  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7156  !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7157  ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7158  ! call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(abs(c(3)), dst_si, src_si, p, &
7159  ! & vscales, vcnk, one, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7160  ! return
7161  !end if
7162  ! Prepare pointers
7163  m = (p+1)**2
7164  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7165  tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7166  n = n + m
7167  tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7168  n = n + m
7169  m = p + 1
7170  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7171  n = n + m
7172  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7173  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7174  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7175  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7176  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
7177  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7178  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
7179  & tmp_l2, work)
7180  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7181  call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, dst_si, src_si, p, vscales, &
7182  & vcnk, one, tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work, work_complex)
7183  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7184  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
7185  & work)
7186  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7187  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
7188 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work
7189 
7190 subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_grad(p, sph_si, vscales, vcnk, sph_l, sph_l_grad)
7191  !! Inputs
7192  integer, intent(in) :: p
7193  real(dp), intent(in) :: sph_si(p+2), vscales((p+2)**2), vcnk((2*p+3)*(p+2)), &
7194  & sph_l((p+1)**2)
7195  !! Output
7196  real(dp), intent(out) :: sph_l_grad((p+2)**2, 3)
7197  !! Local variables
7198  real(dp), dimension(3, 3) :: zx_coord_transform, zy_coord_transform
7199  real(dp) :: tmp((p+1)**2), tmp2((p+2)**2)
7200  ! Set coordinate transformations
7201  zx_coord_transform = zero
7202  zx_coord_transform(3, 2) = one
7203  zx_coord_transform(2, 3) = one
7204  zx_coord_transform(1, 1) = one
7205  zy_coord_transform = zero
7206  zy_coord_transform(1, 2) = one
7207  zy_coord_transform(2, 1) = one
7208  zy_coord_transform(3, 3) = one
7209  ! Transform input harmonics for OX axis
7210  call fmm_sph_transform(p, zx_coord_transform, one, sph_l, zero, tmp)
7211  ! Differentiate L2L along OZ
7212  call fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
7213  & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
7214  ! Transform into output harmonics for OX axis
7215  call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zx_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
7216  & sph_l_grad(:, 1))
7217  ! Transform input harmonics for OY axis
7218  call fmm_sph_transform(p, zy_coord_transform, one, sph_l, zero, tmp)
7219  ! Differentiate M2M along OZ
7220  call fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
7221  & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
7222  ! Transform into output harmonics for OY axis
7223  call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zy_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
7224  & sph_l_grad(:, 2))
7225  ! Differentiate for OZ axis
7226  call fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
7227  & one, sph_l, zero, sph_l_grad(:, 3))
7228 end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_grad
7229 
7255 subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
7256  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
7257  ! Inputs
7258  integer, intent(in) :: p
7259  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7260  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7261  ! Output
7262  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7263  ! Temporary workspace
7264  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7265  ! Call corresponding work routine
7266  call fmm_l2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
7267  & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7268 end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj
7269 
7296 subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
7297  & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7298  ! Inputs
7299  integer, intent(in) :: p
7300  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7301  & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7302  ! Output
7303  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7304  ! Temporary workspace
7305  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7306  ! Local variables
7307  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7308  integer :: m, n
7309  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7310  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7311  ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7312  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7313  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7314  if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7315  ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7316  call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, &
7317  & vfact, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7318  return
7319  end if
7320  ! Prepare pointers
7321  m = (p+1)**2
7322  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7323  tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7324  n = n + m
7325  tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7326  n = n + m
7327  m = p + 1
7328  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7329  n = n + m
7330  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7331  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7332  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7333  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7334  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
7335  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7336  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
7337  & tmp_l2, work)
7338  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7339  call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
7340  & one, tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work)
7341  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7342  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
7343  & work)
7344  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7345  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
7346 end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj_work
7347 
7371 subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate(z, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7372  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l)
7373  ! Inputs
7374  integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
7375  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7376  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
7377  & beta
7378  ! Output
7379  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
7380  ! Temporary workspace
7381  real(dp) :: work((pm+2)*(pm+1))
7382  ! Call corresponding work routine
7383  call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7384  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
7385 end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate
7386 
7411 subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7412  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
7413  ! Inputs
7414  integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
7415  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7416  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
7417  & beta
7418  ! Output
7419  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
7420  ! Temporary workspace
7421  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work((pm+2)*(pm+1))
7422  ! Local variables
7423  real(dp) :: tmp1, tmp2, r1, r2, res1, res2, pow_r2
7424  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indjn, indk1, indk2
7425  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
7426  real(dp), pointer :: src_m2(:), pow_r1(:)
7427  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
7428  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
7429  if (beta .eq. zero) then
7430  dst_l = zero
7431  else
7432  dst_l = beta * dst_l
7433  end if
7434  return
7435  end if
7436  ! Now alpha is non-zero
7437  ! z cannot be zero, as input sphere (multipole) must not intersect with
7438  ! output sphere (local)
7439  if (z .eq. zero) then
7440  return
7441  end if
7442  ! Prepare pointers
7443  n = (pm+1) ** 2
7444  src_m2(1:n) => work(1:n)
7445  pow_r1(1:pm+1) => work(n+1:n+pm+1)
7446  ! Get powers of r1 and r2
7447  r1 = src_r / z
7448  r2 = dst_r / z
7449  ! This abs(r1) makes it possible to work with negative z to avoid
7450  ! unnecessary rotation to positive z
7451  tmp1 = abs(r1)
7452  do j = 0, pm
7453  indj = j*j + j + 1
7454  pow_r1(j+1) = tmp1 / vscales(indj)
7455  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
7456  end do
7457  pow_r2 = one
7458  ! Reorder source harmonics from (degree, order) to (order, degree)
7459  ! Zero order k=0 at first
7460  do j = 0, pm
7461  indj = j*j + j + 1
7462  src_m2(j+1) = pow_r1(j+1) * src_m(indj)
7463  end do
7464  ! Non-zero orders next, a positive k followed by a negative -k
7465  indk1 = pm + 2
7466  do k = 1, pm
7467  n = pm - k + 1
7468  indk2 = indk1 + n
7469  !!GCC$ unroll 4
7470  do j = k, pm
7471  indj = j*j + j + 1
7472  src_m2(indk1+j-k) = pow_r1(j+1) * src_m(indj+k)
7473  src_m2(indk2+j-k) = pow_r1(j+1) * src_m(indj-k)
7474  end do
7475  indk1 = indk2 + n
7476  end do
7477  ! Do actual M2L
7478  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
7479  if (beta .eq. zero) then
7480  do j = 0, pl
7481  ! Offset for dst_l
7482  indj = j*j + j + 1
7483  ! k = 0
7484  tmp1 = alpha * vscales(indj) * pow_r2
7485  pow_r2 = pow_r2 * r2
7486  res1 = zero
7487  !!GCC$ unroll 4
7488  do n = 0, pm
7489  res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_coef(n+1, 1, j+1)*src_m2(n+1)
7490  end do
7491  dst_l(indj) = tmp1 * res1
7492  ! k != 0
7493  !!GCC$ unroll 4
7494  do k = 1, j
7495  ! Offsets for src_m2
7496  indk1 = pm + 2 + (2*pm-k+2)*(k-1)
7497  indk2 = indk1 + pm - k + 1
7498  res1 = zero
7499  res2 = zero
7500  !!GCC$ unroll 4
7501  do n = k, pm
7502  res1 = res1 + &
7503  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7504  & src_m2(indk1+n-k)
7505  res2 = res2 + &
7506  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7507  & src_m2(indk2+n-k)
7508  end do
7509  dst_l(indj+k) = tmp1 * res1
7510  dst_l(indj-k) = tmp1 * res2
7511  end do
7512  end do
7513  else
7514  do j = 0, pl
7515  ! Offset for dst_l
7516  indj = j*j + j + 1
7517  ! k = 0
7518  tmp1 = alpha * vscales(indj) * pow_r2
7519  pow_r2 = pow_r2 * r2
7520  res1 = zero
7521  do n = 0, pm
7522  res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_coef(n+1, 1, j+1)*src_m2(n+1)
7523  end do
7524  dst_l(indj) = beta*dst_l(indj) + tmp1*res1
7525  ! k != 0
7526  do k = 1, j
7527  ! Offsets for src_m2
7528  indk1 = pm + 2 + (2*pm-k+2)*(k-1)
7529  indk2 = indk1 + pm - k + 1
7530  res1 = zero
7531  res2 = zero
7532  do n = k, pm
7533  res1 = res1 + &
7534  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7535  & src_m2(indk1+n-k)
7536  res2 = res2 + &
7537  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7538  & src_m2(indk2+n-k)
7539  end do
7540  dst_l(indj+k) = beta*dst_l(indj+k) + tmp1*res1
7541  dst_l(indj-k) = beta*dst_l(indj-k) + tmp1*res2
7542  end do
7543  end do
7544  end if
7545 end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work
7546 
7570 subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj(z, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
7571  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m)
7572  ! Inputs
7573  integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
7574  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7575  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
7576  & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
7577  ! Output
7578  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
7579  ! Temporary workspace
7580  real(dp) :: work((pl+2)*(pl+1))
7581  ! Call corresponding work routine
7582  call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
7583  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
7584 end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj
7585 
7609 subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
7610  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
7611  ! Inputs
7612  integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
7613  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7614  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
7615  & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
7616  ! Output
7617  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
7618  ! Temporary workspace
7619  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work((pl+2)*(pl+1))
7620  ! Local variables
7621  real(dp) :: tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, r1, r2, pow_r1, res1, res2
7622  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, indk1, indk2
7623  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
7624  real(dp), pointer :: pow_r2(:), src_l2(:)
7625  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
7626  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
7627  if (beta .eq. zero) then
7628  dst_m = zero
7629  else
7630  dst_m = beta * dst_m
7631  end if
7632  return
7633  end if
7634  ! Now alpha is non-zero
7635  ! z cannot be zero, as input sphere (multipole) must not intersect with
7636  ! output sphere (local)
7637  if (z .eq. zero) then
7638  return
7639  end if
7640  ! Prepare pointers
7641  n = (pl+1) ** 2
7642  src_l2(1:n) => work(1:n)
7643  pow_r2(1:pl+1) => work(n+1:n+pl+1)
7644  ! Get powers of r1 and r2
7645  r1 = -dst_r / z
7646  r2 = -src_r / z
7647  ! This abs(r1) makes it possible to work with negative z to avoid
7648  ! unnecessary rotation to positive z
7649  tmp1 = one
7650  do j = 0, pl
7651  indj = j*j + j + 1
7652  pow_r2(j+1) = tmp1 * vscales(indj)
7653  tmp1 = tmp1 * r2
7654  end do
7655  pow_r1 = abs(r1)
7656  ! Reorder source harmonics from (degree, order) to (order, degree)
7657  ! Zero order k=0 at first
7658  do j = 0, pl
7659  indj = j*j + j + 1
7660  src_l2(j+1) = pow_r2(j+1) * src_l(indj)
7661  end do
7662  ! Non-zero orders next, a positive k followed by a negative -k
7663  indk1 = pl + 2
7664  do k = 1, pl
7665  n = pl - k + 1
7666  indk2 = indk1 + n
7667  do j = k, pl
7668  indj = j*j + j + 1
7669  src_l2(indk1+j-k) = pow_r2(j+1) * src_l(indj+k)
7670  src_l2(indk2+j-k) = pow_r2(j+1) * src_l(indj-k)
7671  end do
7672  indk1 = indk2 + n
7673  end do
7674  ! Do actual adjoint M2L
7675  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
7676  if (beta .eq. zero) then
7677  do n = 0, pm
7678  indn = n*n + n + 1
7679  ! k = 0
7680  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1 / vscales(indn)
7681  pow_r1 = pow_r1 * r1
7682  res1 = zero
7683  do j = 0, pl
7684  indj = j*j + j + 1
7685  res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j+1, 1, n+1)*src_l2(j+1)
7686  end do
7687  dst_m(indn) = tmp1 * res1
7688  ! k != 0
7689  do k = 1, n
7690  ! Offsets for src_l2
7691  indk1 = pl + 2 + (2*pl-k+2)*(k-1)
7692  indk2 = indk1 + pl - k + 1
7693  res1 = zero
7694  res2 = zero
7695  do j = k, pl
7696  indj = j*j + j + 1
7697  res1 = res1 + &
7698  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
7699  & src_l2(indk1+j-k)
7700  res2 = res2 + &
7701  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
7702  & src_l2(indk2+j-k)
7703  end do
7704  dst_m(indn+k) = tmp1 * res1
7705  dst_m(indn-k) = tmp1 * res2
7706  end do
7707  end do
7708  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
7709  else
7710  do n = 0, pm
7711  indn = n*n + n + 1
7712  ! k = 0
7713  tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1 / vscales(indn)
7714  pow_r1 = pow_r1 * r1
7715  res1 = zero
7716  do j = 0, pl
7717  indj = j*j + j + 1
7718  res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j+1, 1, n+1)*src_l2(j+1)
7719  end do
7720  dst_m(indn) = beta*dst_m(indn) + tmp1*res1
7721  ! k != 0
7722  do k = 1, n
7723  ! Offsets for src_l2
7724  indk1 = pl + 2 + (2*pl-k+2)*(k-1)
7725  indk2 = indk1 + pl - k + 1
7726  res1 = zero
7727  res2 = zero
7728  do j = k, pl
7729  indj = j*j + j + 1
7730  res1 = res1 + &
7731  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
7732  & src_l2(indk1+j-k)
7733  res2 = res2 + &
7734  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
7735  & src_l2(indk2+j-k)
7736  end do
7737  dst_m(indn+k) = beta*dst_m(indn+k) + tmp1*res1
7738  dst_m(indn-k) = beta*dst_m(indn-k) + tmp1*res2
7739  end do
7740  end do
7741  end if
7742 end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work
7743 
7770 subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7771  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l)
7772  ! Inputs
7773  integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
7774  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
7775  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
7776  & beta
7777  ! Output
7778  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
7779  ! Temporary workspace
7780  real(dp) :: work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
7781  ! Call corresponding work routine
7782  call fmm_m2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7783  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
7784 end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation
7785 
7814 subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7815  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
7816  ! Inputs
7817  integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
7818  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
7819  & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
7820  & beta
7821  ! Output
7822  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
7823  ! Temporary workspace
7824  real(dp), intent(out), target :: &
7825  & work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
7826  ! Local variables
7827  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7828  integer :: m, n, p
7829  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7830  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_ml(:), tmp_ml2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7831  ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7832  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7833  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7834  if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7835  ! Workspace here is (pm+2)*(pm+1)
7836  call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7837  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
7838  return
7839  end if
7840  ! Prepare pointers
7841  p = max(pm, pl)
7842  m = (p+1)**2
7843  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7844  tmp_ml(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7845  n = n + m
7846  tmp_ml2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7847  n = n + m
7848  m = p + 1
7849  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7850  n = n + m
7851  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7852  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7853  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7854  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7855  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(pm, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_ml)
7856  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pm*pm+13*pm+4
7857  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pm, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
7858  & tmp_ml2, work)
7859  ! OZ translation, workspace here is (pm+2)*(pm+1)
7860  call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7861  & m2l_ztranslate_coef, one, tmp_ml2, zero, tmp_ml, work)
7862  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pl*pl+13*pl+4
7863  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pl, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
7864  & tmp_ml2, work)
7865  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7866  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(pl, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_ml2, beta, dst_l)
7867 end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_work
7868 
7894 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
7895  & src_m, beta, dst_l)
7896  use complex_bessel
7897  ! Inputs
7898  integer, intent(in) :: p
7899  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7900  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
7901  ! Output
7902  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7903  ! Temporary workspace
7904  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2
7905  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
7906  integer :: NZ, ierr
7907  ! Compute Bessel functions
7908  z1 = src_r * kappa
7909  z2 = dst_r * kappa
7910  s1 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z1)))
7911  s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
7912  call cbesk(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7913  src_sk(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
7914  call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7915  dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
7916  if (p .gt. 0) then
7917  call cbesk(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7918  src_sk(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7919  call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7920  dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7921  end if
7922  ! Call corresponding work routine
7923  call fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_work(c*kappa, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
7924  & src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7925 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation
7926 
7953 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_work(c, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
7954  & src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7955  ! Inputs
7956  integer, intent(in) :: p
7957  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7958  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7959  ! Output
7960  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7961  ! Temporary workspace
7962  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7963  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
7964  ! Local variables
7965  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7966  integer :: m, n
7967  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7968  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7969  ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7970  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7971  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7972  !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7973  ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7974  ! call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
7975  ! & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
7976  ! return
7977  !end if
7978  ! Prepare pointers
7979  m = (p+1)**2
7980  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7981  tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7982  n = n + m
7983  tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7984  n = n + m
7985  m = p + 1
7986  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7987  n = n + m
7988  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7989  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7990  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7991  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7992  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
7993  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7994  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
7995  & tmp_m2, work)
7996  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7997  call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(rho, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, one, &
7998  & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work, work_complex)
7999  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
8000  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
8001  & work)
8002  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8003  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_l)
8004 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_work
8005 
8031 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
8032  & src_m, beta, dst_l)
8033  use complex_bessel
8034  ! Inputs
8035  integer, intent(in) :: p
8036  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8037  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
8038  ! Output
8039  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8040  ! Temporary workspace
8041  real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2, ck(3)
8042  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
8043  integer :: NZ, ierr
8044  ! Compute Bessel functions
8045  z1 = src_r * kappa
8046  z2 = dst_r * kappa
8047  s1 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z1)))
8048  s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
8049  call cbesk(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8050  src_sk(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
8051  call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8052  dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
8053  if (p .gt. 0) then
8054  call cbesk(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
8055  src_sk(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
8056  call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
8057  dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
8058  end if
8059  ! Call corresponding work routine
8060  ck = - c*kappa
8061  call fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(ck, dst_si, src_sk, p, vscales, &
8062  & vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8063 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj
8064 
8091 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(c, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
8092  & src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8093  ! Inputs
8094  integer, intent(in) :: p
8095  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8096  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8097  ! Output
8098  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8099  ! Temporary workspace
8100  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
8101  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8102  ! Local variables
8103  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
8104  integer :: m, n
8105  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
8106  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
8107  ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
8108  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
8109  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
8110  !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
8111  ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
8112  ! call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
8113  ! & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
8114  ! return
8115  !end if
8116  ! Prepare pointers
8117  m = (p+1)**2
8118  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
8119  tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
8120  n = n + m
8121  tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
8122  n = n + m
8123  m = p + 1
8124  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
8125  n = n + m
8126  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
8127  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
8128  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
8129  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8130  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
8131  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
8132  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
8133  & tmp_m2, work)
8134  ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
8135  call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, one, &
8136  & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work, work_complex)
8137  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
8138  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
8139  & work)
8140  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8141  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_l)
8142 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work
8143 
8166 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
8167  & src_m, beta, dst_l)
8168  ! Inputs
8169  integer, intent(in) :: p
8170  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8171  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8172  ! Output
8173  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8174  ! Temporary workspace
8175  real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
8176  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8177  ! Call corresponding work routine
8178  call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
8179  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8180 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate
8181 
8206 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
8207  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8208  use complex_bessel
8209  ! Inputs
8210  integer, intent(in) :: p
8211  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8212  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8213  ! Output
8214  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8215  ! Temporary workspace
8216  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
8217  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8218  ! Local variables
8219  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
8220  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
8221  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
8222  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
8223  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
8224  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
8225  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
8226  if (beta .eq. zero) then
8227  dst_l = zero
8228  else
8229  dst_l = beta * dst_l
8230  end if
8231  return
8232  end if
8233  ! Get factorials
8234  fact(1) = one
8235  do j = 1, 2*p
8236  fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
8237  end do
8238  ! Now alpha is non-zero
8239  ! If harmonics have different centers
8240  if (z .ne. 0) then
8241  complex_argument = z
8242  call cbesk(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8243  work(1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
8244  if (p .gt. 0) then
8245  call cbesk(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
8246  & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
8247  work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
8248  end if
8249  ! Do actual M2M
8250  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8251  if (beta .eq. zero) then
8252  dst_l = zero
8253  do j = 0, p
8254  ! Offset for dst_m
8255  indj = j*j + j + 1
8256  ! k = 0
8257  k = 0
8258  res1 = zero
8259  do n = 0, p
8260  ! Offset for src_m
8261  indn = n*n + n + 1
8262  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8263  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
8264  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1)
8265  tmp3 = zero
8266  do l = 0, min(j, n)
8267  tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8268  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8269  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8270  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8271  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8272  end do
8273  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8274  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
8275  end do
8276  dst_l(indj) = res1
8277  ! k != 0
8278  do k = 1, j
8279  res1 = zero
8280  res2 = zero
8281  do n = k, p
8282  ! Offset for src_m
8283  indn = n*n + n + 1
8284  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8285  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
8286  & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1)
8287  tmp3 = zero
8288  do l = k, min(j, n)
8289  tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8290  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8291  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8292  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8293  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8294  end do
8295  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8296  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
8297  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
8298  end do
8299  dst_l(indj+k) = res1
8300  dst_l(indj-k) = res2
8301  end do
8302  end do
8303  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8304  else
8305  stop 111
8306  end if
8307  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
8308  else
8309  stop 222
8310  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8311  if (beta .eq. zero) then
8312  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8313  tmp1 = alpha * r1
8314  do j = 0, p
8315  indj = j*j + j + 1
8316  do k = indj-j, indj+j
8317  dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
8318  end do
8319  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8320  end do
8321  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8322  else
8323  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8324  tmp1 = alpha * r1
8325  do j = 0, p
8326  indj = j*j + j + 1
8327  do k = indj-j, indj+j
8328  dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
8329  end do
8330  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8331  end do
8332  end if
8333  end if
8334 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work
8335 
8358 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
8359  & src_m, beta, dst_l)
8360  ! Inputs
8361  integer, intent(in) :: p
8362  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8363  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8364  ! Output
8365  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8366  ! Temporary workspace
8367  real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
8368  complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8369  ! Call corresponding work routine
8370  call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
8371  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8372 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj
8373 
8398 subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, &
8399  & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8400  use complex_bessel
8401  ! Inputs
8402  integer, intent(in) :: p
8403  real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8404  & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8405  ! Output
8406  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8407  ! Temporary workspace
8408  real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
8409  complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8410  ! Local variables
8411  real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2, pow_r1
8412  integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
8413  ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
8414  real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
8415  complex(dp) :: complex_argument
8416  ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
8417  if (alpha .eq. zero) then
8418  if (beta .eq. zero) then
8419  dst_l = zero
8420  else
8421  dst_l = beta * dst_l
8422  end if
8423  return
8424  end if
8425  ! Get factorials
8426  fact(1) = one
8427  do j = 1, 2*p
8428  fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
8429  end do
8430  ! Now alpha is non-zero
8431  ! If harmonics have different centers
8432  if (z .ne. 0) then
8433  complex_argument = z
8434  call cbesk(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8435  work(1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
8436  if (p .gt. 0) then
8437  call cbesk(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
8438  & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
8439  work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
8440  end if
8441  ! Do actual M2M
8442  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8443  if (beta .eq. zero) then
8444  dst_l = zero
8445  do n = 0, p
8446  ! Offset for dst_m
8447  indn = n*n + n + 1
8448  ! k = 0
8449  k = 0
8450  res1 = zero
8451  do j = 0, p
8452  ! Offset for src_m
8453  indj = j*j + j + 1
8454  tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8455  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) * &
8456  & src_sk(j+1) / vscales(indj) / dst_si(n+1)
8457  tmp3 = zero
8458  do l = 0, min(j, n)
8459  tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8460  & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8461  & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8462  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8463  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8464  end do
8465  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8466  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj)
8467  end do
8468  dst_l(indn) = res1
8469  ! k != 0
8470  do k = 1, n
8471  res1 = zero
8472  res2 = zero
8473  do j = k, p
8474  ! Offset for src_m
8475  indj = j*j + j + 1
8476  tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8477  & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) * &
8478  & src_sk(j+1) / vscales(indj+k) / dst_si(n+1)
8479  tmp3 = zero
8480  do l = k, min(j, n)
8481  tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8482  & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8483  & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8484  & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8485  tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8486  end do
8487  tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8488  res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj+k)
8489  res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indj-k)
8490  end do
8491  dst_l(indn+k) = res1
8492  dst_l(indn-k) = res2
8493  end do
8494  end do
8495  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8496  else
8497  stop 111
8498  end if
8499  ! If harmonics are located at the same point
8500  else
8501  stop 222
8502  ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8503  if (beta .eq. zero) then
8504  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8505  tmp1 = alpha * r1
8506  do j = 0, p
8507  indj = j*j + j + 1
8508  do k = indj-j, indj+j
8509  dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
8510  end do
8511  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8512  end do
8513  ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8514  else
8515  !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8516  tmp1 = alpha * r1
8517  do j = 0, p
8518  indj = j*j + j + 1
8519  do k = indj-j, indj+j
8520  dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
8521  end do
8522  tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8523  end do
8524  end if
8525  end if
8526 end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work
8527 
8554 subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8555  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m)
8556  ! Inputs
8557  integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
8558  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
8559  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
8560  & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
8561  ! Output
8562  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
8563  ! Temporary workspace
8564  real(dp) :: work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
8565  ! Call corresponding work routine
8566  call fmm_m2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8567  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
8568 end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj
8569 
8598 subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8599  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
8600  ! Inputs
8601  integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
8602  real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
8603  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
8604  & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
8605  ! Output
8606  real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
8607  ! Temporary workspace
8608  real(dp), intent(out), target :: &
8609  & work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
8610  ! Local variables
8611  real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
8612  integer :: m, n, p
8613  ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
8614  real(dp), pointer :: tmp_ml(:), tmp_ml2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
8615  ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
8616  call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
8617  ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
8618  if (stheta .eq. 0) then
8619  ! Workspace here is (pl+2)*(pl+1)
8620  call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8621  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
8622  return
8623  end if
8624  ! Prepare pointers
8625  p = max(pm, pl)
8626  m = (p+1)**2
8627  n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
8628  tmp_ml(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
8629  n = n + m
8630  tmp_ml2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
8631  n = n + m
8632  m = p + 1
8633  vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
8634  n = n + m
8635  vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
8636  ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
8637  call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
8638  ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8639  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(pl, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_ml)
8640  ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pl*pl+13*pl+4
8641  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pl, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
8642  & tmp_ml2, work)
8643  ! OZ translation, workspace here is (pl+2)*(pl+1)
8644  call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8645  & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, one, tmp_ml2, zero, tmp_ml, work)
8646  ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pm*pm+13*pm+4
8647  call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pm, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
8648  & tmp_ml2, work)
8649  ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8650  call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(pm, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_ml2, beta, dst_m)
8651 end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj_work
8652 
8653 end module ddx_harmonics
8654 
ddx_harmonics::fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj
subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj(z, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
Direct M2M translation over OZ axis.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:4629
ddx_harmonics::fmm_l2p_work
subroutine fmm_l2p_work(c, src_r, p, vscales_rel, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_v, work)
Accumulate potential, induced by local spherical harmonics.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:2166
ddx_harmonics::fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work
subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
Direct M2M translation over OZ axis.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:6356
ddx_harmonics::fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work
subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
Direct M2M translation over OZ axis.
